MenuLocales.MainMenu_MatchDesc: Play a friendly game of Gwent

MenuLocales.PopupWindow_IncompleteDeckDesc: This deck is not complete. Please edit it and return.
MenuLocales.IngameMenu_EnemyDecidingCoin: Your opponent is deciding coin point.
MenuLocales.ShupeKnight_5_Destroy: Destroy enemies with less than 4 power.
MenuLocales.ShupeHunter_2_RepeatedDamage: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat 8 times.
MenuLocales.ShupeHunter_3_Replay: Replay a Bronze or Silver ally and boost it by 5.
MenuLocales.ShupeHunter_4_PlayFromDeck: Play a Bronze or Silver unit from your deck
MenuLocales.ShupeHunter_5_ClearSky: Clear all Hazards from your side and boost allies by 1.
MenuLocales.ShupeMage_3_Hazard: Spawn random Hazards on all enemy rows.
MenuLocales.ShupeMage_4_Damage: Deal 10 damage to an enemy and 5 to any adjacent to it.
MenuLocales.ShupeMage_5_Special: Play a Bronze or Silver special card from your deck.

12004.Name: Geralt of Rivia
12004.Flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

12005.Name: Ciri: Dash
12005.Info: Whenever this unit enters the graveyard, return it to your deck and Strengthen it by 3.
12005.Flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

12006.Name: Saesenthessis: Blaze
12006.Info: Deploy: Discard your hand and draw that many cards.
12006.Flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

12007.Name: Triss Merigold
12007.Flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

12008.Name: Villentretenmerth
12008.Info: After 3 turns, destroy the Highest units. 3 Armor.
12008.Flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

12009.Name: Ale of the Ancestors
12009.Info: Deploy: Apply Golden Froth to the row. Repeat this ability when moved, and then taken 4 damage.
12009.Flavor: Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.

12010.Name: Yennefer: Conjurer
12010.Info: On turn end, Deal 1 damage to the Highest enemies.
12010.Flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice... and when to conjure fire.

12011.Name: Dandelion: Vainglory
12011.Info: Deploy: For every Geralt, Yennefer, Ciri or Zoltan card in your own starting deck gain 3 points
12011.Flavor: Dandelion told me all about your adventures. How'd he ready you for battle with his songs, how he tamed the kayran by playin' his lute...

12012.Name: Avallac'h
12012.Info: Deploy, Truce: Each player draws 2 cards

12013.Name: Lambert: Swordmaster
12013.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to all copies of an enemy unit.
12013.Flavor: Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.

12014.Name: Triss: Butterfly Spell
12014.Info: On turn end, Boost the Lowest allies by 1.
12014.Flavor: Cap'n... our arrows, they've... they've got wings!

12015.Name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
12015.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Spawn a Companion that boosts 2 adjacent units by 2; or Spawn an Agitator that deals 2 damage to 2 adjacent units.
12015.Flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

12016.Name: Eskel: Pathfinder
12016.Info: Deploy: Destroy a Bronze or Silver enemy that is not boosted
12016.Flavor: Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.

12017.Name: Geralt: Professional
12017.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to an enemy unit. If it's a monster unit, destroy it instead.
12017.Flavor: I accepted a job once, did it. Asked to choose my reward, I invoked the Law of Surprise.

12018.Name: Ihuarraquax
12018.Info:
Deploy: Deal 5 damage to self.
When the current power is equal to the base power, deal 7 damage to 3 random enemy units at the end of the turn.
12018.Flavor: "Inconceivable. Impossible", Ciri thought, returning to her senses. "Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct."

12019.Name: Ciri
12019.Info: Gain shield. Whenever you lose a round, return this unit to your hand.
12019.Flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please

12020.Name: Gaunter O'Dimm
12020.Info: Deploy, Gamble with Gaunter: Guess whether the power of the card he's picked has power lesser, equal or greater than 6.
12020.Flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

12021.Name: Geralt: Aard
12021.Info: Deploy: Deal 3 damage to 3 enemies and move them to the row above.
12021.Flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

12022.Name: Regis: Higher Vampire
12022.Info: Deploy: Look at 3 Bronze units from your opponent's deck. Consume 1, then boost self by its base power.
12022.Flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

12023.Name: Vesemir: Mentor
12023.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Alchemy card from your deck.
12023.Flavor: Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.

12024.Name: Yennefer
12024.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Spawn a Unicorn that boosts all units by 2; or Spawn a Chironex that deals 2 damage to all units.
12024.Flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

12025.Name: Geralt: Yrden
12025.Info: Deploy: Reset all units on a row and remove thair tokens.
12025.Flavor: He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.

12026.Name: Triss: Telekinesis
12026.Info: Deploy: Create and play a bronze special card from either player's current deck.
12026.Flavor: Bindings won't suffice. Nor will a gag render her any less dangerous. No, dimeritium is the only solution.

12002.Name: Geralt: Igni
12002.Info: Deploy: Destroy the Highest units on an enemy row if that row has a total of 25 or more.
12002.Flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

12027.Name: Aguara
12027.Info: Deploy, Choose Two: Boost the Lowest ally by 5; Boost a random unit in your hand by 5; Deal 5 damage to the Highest enemy; Charm an enemy Elf with 5 power or less.
12027.Flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!

12028.Name: Phoenix
12028.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Draconid.
12028.Flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, the question seems downright trivial.

12003.Name: Dandelion: Poet
12003.Info: Deploy: Draw 1 card and then play 1 card.
12003.Flavor: The quill is mightier than the sword.

12029.Name: Avallac'h: Sage
12029.Info: Deploy: Spawn a copy of a random Gold or Silver unit from your opponent's starting deck.
12029.Flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

12030.Name: Aguara: True Form
12030.Info: Deploy: Create a Bronze or Silver Spell
12030.Flavor: Ever heard of an "anterion"? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on a human form.

12031.Name: Regis
12031.Info: Deploy: Drain all boosts from a unit.
12031.Flavor: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.

12032.Name: Ciri: Nova
12032.Info: Deploy: If you have exactly 2 copies of each bronze in your deck, set the base power of this card to 22.
12032.Flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.

12033.Name: Korathi Heatwave
12033.Info: Apply a Hazard to each enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Lowest unit on turn start.
12033.Flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.

12034.Name: Ragh Nar Roog
12034.Info: Apply a Hazard to each enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Highest unit on turn start.
12034.Flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos

12001.Name: Royal Decree
12001.Info: Play a Gold unit from your deck and boost it by 2.
12001.Flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following..

12036.Name: Vigo's Muzzle
12036.Info: Move a Bronze or Silver enemy with 8 power or less to the opposite row.
12036.Flavor: Not every beast can be tamed. But all can be muzzled.

12037.Name: Wolfsbane
12037.Info: After 3 turns in the graveyard, deal 6 damage to the Highest enemy and boost the Lowest ally by 6.
12037.Flavor: Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews

12038.Name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
12038.Info: Spawn a copy of a Gold unit from your opponent's graveyard and boost it by 2.
12038.Flavor: This spell lets you see the last moment's of a dead man's life... if you can survive its casting.

12039.Name: Uma's Curse
12039.Flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this... monstrosity?

12040.Name: Trial of the Grasses
12040.Info: Deal 10 damage to a unit, unless it's a Witcher. If it survives, boost it to 25 power.
12040.Flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.

12041.Name: Shupe's Bizzarre Adventure
12041.Info: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
12041.Flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

12042.Name: Sihil
12042.Info: Choose One: Deal 3 damage to all enemies with odd power; or Deal 3 damage to all enemies with even power; or Play a random Bronze or Silver unit from your deck.
12042.Flavor: "What's written on this blade? That a curse?" "No. An insult."

13003.Name: Sarah
13003.Info: Deploy: Swap a card for one of the same color.

13004.Name: Iris' Companions
13004.Info: Deploy: Move a card from your deck to your hand, then Discard a random card.
13004.Flavor: 我们的名字还是不说为好。就当我们是……主人家的朋友吧。

13005.Name: Germain Piquant
13005.Info: Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows on each side of this unit.
13005.Flavor: 陶森特需要这位英雄，但它不配。

13006.Name: Nivellen
13006.Info: Deploy: Move all units on a row to random rows
13006.Flavor: 迷路了？要迷路到其它地方去，只要别在我这儿瞎逛就行。把你的左耳对准太阳，一直往前，没多久就能走上大路。怎么？你还在等什么？

13007.Name: Stregobor
13007.Info: Deploy, Truce: Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
13007.Flavor: 猎魔人见过看上去像议员的贼，见过看上去像乞丐的议员，也见过看上去像贼的国王。不过斯崔葛布的样子，就和大众心目中法师的形象没什么两样。

13008.Name: Johnny
13008.Info: Deploy: Discard a card. Then make a copy of a card of the same color from your opponent's starting deck in your hand.
13008.Flavor: 要是再也没办法亲口说出“狮子头上长虱子”，生活就真的太无趣啦。

13009.Name: Cyprian Wiley
13009.Flavor: 诺维格瑞的黑帮四巨头之一——另外三个是西吉·卢文、卡罗·“砍刀”·凡瑞西和乞丐王。

13010.Name: Ocvist
13010.Info: Single-Use. After 4 turns, deal 1 damage to all enemies, then on round start, return to your hand.
13010.Flavor: 他是石英山之主，毁灭者，图拉真的屠夫。但在闲暇时间里，他喜欢远足和烛光晚餐。

13011.Name: Carlo Varese
13011.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage for each card in your hand.
13011.Flavor: 每个想要在诺维格瑞做生意的都很清楚——要么同意卡罗的条件，要么就夹着尾巴滚出去。

13012.Name: Myrgtabrakke
13012.Info: Deploy: Damage Units by 3, 2 and then 1.
13012.Flavor: 永远别想分开母龙和她的孩子。

13013.Name: Vesemir
13013.Flavor: 就算上了绞架也别放弃——让他们给你拿点水，毕竟没人知道水拿来前会发生什么。

13014.Name: Eskel
13014.Flavor: 白狼，我只是个普通猎魔人。我不猎龙，不跟国王称兄道弟，也不和女术士纠缠……

13015.Name: Olgierd von Everec
13015.Info: Deathwish: Resurrect this unit on a random row
13015.Flavor: 至少你知道我的头不好砍了。

13002.Name: Francis Bedlam
13002.Info: Deploy: If losing, Strengthen self up to a maximum of 15 until scores are tied
13002.Flavor: 要是我缺鼻子或者断手了，那显然，乞丐王接受这两种付款方式。

13016.Name: Operator
13016.Info: Single-Use. Deploy, Truce: Make a default copy of a Bronze unit in your hand for both players.
13016.Flavor: 时空在我们面前瓦解，也在我们身后膨胀，这就是穿越。

13017.Name: Lambert
13017.Flavor: 这样的沟通方式才对路嘛！

13018.Name: Vaedermakar
13018.Info: Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Alzur's Thunder
13018.Flavor: 控天者德鲁伊能操控各种元素之力，让狂风暴雨化为绕指柔风，降下毁天灭地的雹暴，还能拖雷掣电让敌军灰飞烟灭……所以我给你个忠告：面对他，一定要毕恭毕敬。

13001.Name: Roach
13001.Info: Whenever you play a Gold unit from your hand, Summon this unit
13001.Flavor: 杰洛特，我们得来场人马间的对话。恕我直言，你的骑术……真的有待提高，伙计。

13019.Name: Iris von Everec
13019.Info: Spying. Deathwish: Boost 5 random units on the opposite side by 5.
13019.Flavor: 我的回忆所剩无几……但每次想到我的玫瑰，记忆便会涌现。

13020.Name: Dorregaray of Vole
13020.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Savage Bear, Wyvern, Ekimmara or Drowner.
13020.Flavor: 和猎魔人一样，多瑞加雷也热爱同怪物打交道。不过他有自己的一套分类系统。别人眼里面目可憎的食尸生物、食人魔，在他看来都特别可爱。

13021.Name: Dudu
13021.Info: Deploy: Choose an Enemy and copy its Power.
13021.Flavor: 拟态怪有很多别名：易形怪、二重身、模仿怪……变形怪。

13023.Name: Black Blood
13023.Info: Choose One: Create a Bronze Necrophage or Vampire and boost it by 2; or Destroy a Bronze or Silver Necrophage or Vampire.
13023.Flavor: 吸血鬼们纷纷表示：使用这种药水有违体育精神。

13024.Name: Alzur's Double–Cross
13024.Info: Boost the Highest Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck by 2 and play it.
13024.Flavor: 阿尔祖创造的一些怪物仍在四处游荡，其中便有令人胆寒的巨蜈蚣——它杀掉了创造自己的法师，摧毁了半个马里波，然后逃进了河谷地区幽暗的森林。

13025.Name: Artefact Compression
13025.Info: Transform a Bronze or Silver unit into a Jade Figurine.
13025.Flavor: 雕像瞬间爆开，颤动不已，犹如一道在地上爬行的烟雾，变换着自己的形状。道道光芒里，有东西上下纷飞，不断成形。片刻之后，魔法圈的正中间突然现出了一道人影。

13026.Name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
13026.Info: Transfer up to 10 power between the Highest and Lowest unit.
13026.Flavor: 当你凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视着你。

13027.Name: Commander's Horn
13027.Flavor: 士气加一分，听力减三分。

13028.Name: Decoy
13028.Info: Return a Bronze or Silver Ally to your Hand, Boost it by 3 and play it.
13028.Flavor: 如果拿来应急，假人也是不错的挡箭牌。

13029.Name: Dimeritium Bomb
13029.Info: Reset all boosted units on a row.
13029.Flavor: 女巫猎人必备。无声的闪光过后，最强大的法师也得乖乖就擒。

13030.Name: Manticore Venom
13030.Flavor: 剧毒致命的速度快得让你连尼弗迦德皇帝的头衔都念不完。

13031.Name: Marching Orders
13031.Info: Boost the Lowest Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck by 2 and play it.
13031.Flavor: 我们只不过是老头子们的棋子，为他们腐朽的妄想命丧沙场……

13032.Name: Merigold's Hailstorm
13032.Info: Halve the power of all Bronze and Silver units on a row.
13032.Flavor: 天空突然暗了下来，云层笼罩在城镇上空。愁云惨淡之中，寒风呼啸而过。“哦，我的天哪，”叶奈法吸了口气，“看起来你成功了……”

13033.Name: Necromancy
13033.Info: Banish a Bronze or Silver unit from either graveyard, then boost an ally by its power.
13033.Flavor: 无论怎样……我们都有办法叫你开口。

13034.Name: Scorch
13034.Flavor: 杰洛特退了一步。他见过不少被烧弹击中的人，更准确地说，他见过不少烧弹留下的残骸。

13035.Name: Skellige Storm
13035.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2, 1 and 1 damage to the leftmost units on the row on turn start.
13035.Flavor: 这可不是普通风暴，这是天神之怒。

13036.Name: Summoning Circle
13036.Info: Spawn a default copy of the last Bronze or Silver non-Agent unit placed on the board.
13036.Flavor: 在我们所处的位面之外，还存在着许许多多的位面……只要掌握了正确的知识，就可以接触并召唤远超人类想象的生物。

13037.Name: The Last Wish
13037.Info: Draw your top 2 cards. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
13037.Flavor: 亲爱的先生们，一只气灵三个愿望，随后它们就会跑回自己的界域去。

13038.Name: White Frost
13038.Info: Apply a Frost Hazard to 2 adjacent opposing rows. Frost Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.
13038.Flavor: 见证“泰德戴尔瑞”——终焉纪元——这被白霜摧毀的世界吧！

13039.Name: Tainted Ale
13039.Info: Deal 6 damage to the Highest enemy on each row.
13039.Flavor: 这酒原本就是绿色的吗……？

13040.Name: Mandrake
13040.Info: Choose One: Heal a unit and Strengthen it by 6; or Reset a unit and Weaken it by 6.
13040.Flavor: 衮衮诸公，瞠目环立，不肯相信这高贵的发现。有的在谈曼陀罗花，有的又说是在用黑犬。

13041.Name: Bekker's Rockslide
13041.Info: Deal 2 damage to up to 10 random enemies.
13041.Flavor: 只要一块小石子，我们就完蛋了。

13042.Name: Glorious Hunt
13042.Info: If losing, Spawn an Imperial Manticore. If winning or tied, Spawn Manticore Venom.
13042.Flavor: 以诸神的名义，猎魔人，你把这鬼东西拿来干嘛？！“我要那畜生的脑袋！”这句话不过是打个比方！

13043.Name: Dragon's Dream
13043.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that will explode and deal 4 damage to all units when a different special card is played.
13043.Flavor: 在瑟瑞卡尼亚，龙神崇拜体现在日常生活的各个方面。因此也难怪他们会以此为武器命名了。

13044.Name: Garrison
13044.Info: Create a Bronze or Silver unit from your opponent's starting deck and boost it by 2.

14002.Name: Adrenaline Rush
14002.Flavor: 那野兽狂暴地扑来，眼中怒火熊熊，全然不顾疼痛和抵抗者的拼命反击。挡它者，唯有一死……

14003.Name: Alzur's Thunder
14003.Flavor: 我们全然无法念诵“阿尔祖落雷术”这样深奥复杂的咒语。据说，阿尔祖声如狩猎号角，言若讲演名家。

14004.Name: Arachas Venom
14004.Flavor: “若不慎接触眼部，请立即用冷水冲洗，然后起草遗嘱。”

14005.Name: Biting Frost
14005.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Lowest unit on turn start.
14005.Flavor: 寒霜凛冽的好处就是尸体不会腐烂得那么快。

14006.Name: Bloodcurdling Roar
14006.Info: Destroy a friendly unit. Spawn and play a bear.
14006.Flavor: 起初我们碰上了一头熊……悲剧就从那时开始了。

14007.Name: Dimeritium Shackles
14007.Info: Lock a unit. If an enemy, deal 4 damage to it.
14007.Flavor: 瑞达尼亚人将巫师的手腕拧到背后，给他戴上镣铐，并使劲晃了晃。特拉诺瓦叫喊挣扎，还弯下腰呕吐呻吟——杰洛特这才明白手铐的材质。

14008.Name: Epidemic
14008.Flavor: 瘟疫不仁，以万物为刍狗。

14009.Name: Clear Skies
14009.Info: Choose One: Boost all damaged allies under Hazards by 2 and clear all Hazards from your side; or Play a random Bronze unit from your deck.
14009.Flavor: 太阳出来了，德洛米！太阳出来了！也许我们命不该绝……

14010.Name: Petri's Philter
14010.Info: Boost up to 6 random allies by 2.

14011.Name: Impenetrable Fog
14011.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Highest unit on turn start.
14011.Flavor: 优秀指挥官的福音……拙劣指挥官的噩梦。

14012.Name: Lacerate
14012.Info: Damage all Units on a row by 3.
14012.Flavor: 那绝对是你前所未见的恐怖场景——可怜的家伙……躺倒在地，任凭怪兽肆意摆布。

14013.Name: Spores
14013.Info: Choose one: reset a unit and strengthen it by 3; or reset a unit and weaken it by 3.
14013.Flavor: Carried by the wind across the Continent… Sowing madness and blight where they fall.

14014.Name: Shrike
14014.Info: Damage up to 6 random Enemies by 2.
14014.Flavor: 虽对人类致命，但药水的毒性对猎魔人来说却微乎其微。

14015.Name: Wyvern Scale Shield
14015.Info: Boost a unit by the base power of a Bronze or Silver unit in your hand.
14015.Flavor: 比一般的盾牌要坚固，而且更时髦。

14016.Name: Stammelford's Tremors
14016.Flavor: 巫师斯丹莫福德曾将一座挡住他高塔视线的大山移走。传言他有这等移山之力，全因得到了一只地灵——也就是土界灵——的服务。

14017.Name: Swallow
14017.Flavor: 这种药水能加速伤口的结痂和痊愈，而它之所以叫做“燕子”，因为雨燕是春天与希望的象征。

14018.Name: Thunderbolt
14018.Info: Boost 3 adjacent units by 3 and give them 2 Armor.
14018.Flavor: 猎魔人脸色陡变……平日的风度荡然无存，令人毛骨悚然。

14019.Name: Torrential Rain
14019.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that on turn start, deals 1 damage to one strongest unit and one weakest unit.
14019.Flavor: 这儿连雨都带股尿骚味。

14020.Name: Mahakam Ale
14020.Info: Deploy: Boost a random Ally on each row by 4.
14020.Flavor: 无可争议是矮人们对世界文化所作出的最杰出贡献。

14021.Name: Crow's Eye
14021.Info: Deal 4 damage to the Highest enemy on each row. Deal 1 extra damage for each copy of this card in your graveyard.
14021.Flavor: 某个大名鼎鼎的海盗曾经沉迷于这种迷人的药草，进而得名“乌鸦眼”。然而对于海盗故事十分讲究的人而言，他的这一段传说实在太不像话，自然也就没能流传下来。

14022.Name: Doppler
14022.Info: Spawn a random Bronze unit from your faction.
14022.Flavor: 人类对变形怪深恶痛绝，觉得光是处刑还不够。因此一旦落入人类手中，他们自然就凶多吉少了……

14023.Name: Rock Barrage
14023.Info: Deal 7 damage to an enemy and move it to the row above. If the row is full, destroy the enemy instead.
14023.Flavor: 有一天等你老了，也会难逃被石头砸中的厄运。

14024.Name: Mastercrafted Spear
14024.Info: Deal damage equal to the base power of a Bronze or Silver unit in your hand.
14024.Flavor: 把长矛立起来，懒虫！一匹马都不能放过去！

14001.Name: Scout
14001.Info: Look at 2 Bronze units in your deck, then play 1.
14001.Flavor: 如果斥候没有回来，我们就掉头。乡下的人说这些树林里全是松鼠。我指的可不是啃松果的那种。

14025.Name: Spores
14025.Info: Deal 2 damage to all units on a row and clear a Boon from it.
14025.Flavor: 吃够量，世界就会变个样……

14026.Name: Golden Froth
14026.Info: Apply a Boon to an allied row that boosts 2 random units by 1 on turn start.
14026.Flavor: 闻到了吗？那是幸福的味道。

14027.Name: Peasant Militia
14027.Flavor: 瞧，我们是民兵。我们保卫和平

15001.Name: Shupe: Knight
15001.Info: Send Shupe to the Imperial Court Military Academy. Strengthen yourself to 25; Gain resilience; Dual a unit; Reset a unit; Destroy all enemy units with power less than 4 points.
15001.Flavor: 其他巨魔都觉得他是个异类，毕竟在巨魔们看来，谁会喜欢彩色纸片胜过喜欢石头呢？

15002.Name: Shupe: Hunter
15002.Info: Send Shupe to the forests of Dol Blathanna. Deal 15 damage; Deal 2 damage to a random enemy 8 times; Replay a bronze or silver unit and give it 5 points; Play a bronze or silver unit from your deck; Remove hazards on your side of the board a give boost your units by 1
15002.Flavor: 其他巨魔都觉得他是个异类，毕竟在巨魔们看来，谁会喜欢彩色纸片胜过喜欢石头呢？

15003.Name: Shupe: Mage
15003.Info: Send Shupe to the Ban Ard Academy. Draw 1 card; Charm a random enemy unit; Spawn a random hazard on all opponent's rows; Deal 10 damage to an enemy unit, than 5 damage to adjacent units; Play a special card from your deck.
15003.Flavor: 其他巨魔都觉得他是个异类，毕竟在巨魔们看来，谁会喜欢彩色纸片胜过喜欢石头呢？

15004.Name: Chironex
15004.Info: Deploy: Remove 2 strength from all units on the battlefield
15004.Flavor: “天呐，那根本不是独角兽！那是……”——著名奇珍收藏家崴尔玛的遗言。

15005.Name: Artifact
15005.Flavor: 雕像瞬间爆开，颤动不已，犹如一道在地上爬行的烟雾，变换着自己的形状。道道光芒里，有东西上下纷飞，不断成形。片刻之后，魔法圈的正中间突然现出了一道人影。

15006.Name: Duda: Agitator
15006.Info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage to 2 adjacent units.
15006.Flavor: 卓尔坦的鹦鹉拥有一项超凡能力：能逼疯所有与它相处的人，包括卓尔坦本人。

15007.Name: Duda: Companion
15007.Flavor: 它会说一百个词，其中八十个是脏话，剩下的是脏话的语气词。

15008.Name: Unicorn
15008.Info: Deploy: Add 2 strength to all units on the battlefield
15008.Flavor: 都说独角兽喜欢幼莲。但如今，幼莲跟独角兽一样稀缺，这理论也就难以证明了。

15009.Name: Chort
15009.Flavor: 牛牛防卫队的一员。永远忠诚！

15010.Name: Elder Bear
15010.Flavor: 去猎熊吧！去抓上一只——这、这只也太大了吧！快跑！！

15011.Name: Peasant
15011.Flavor: 瞧，我们是民兵。我们保卫和平

15012.Name: Cow
15012.Flavor: 在鲍克兰，什么东西都比其它地方的要棒：酒更甜美，牛儿更肥，而姑娘们则更加动人。

15013.Name: Clear Skies
15013.Info: Boost all damaged allies under Hazards by 2 and clear all Hazards from your side.
15013.Flavor: 太阳出来了，德洛米！太阳出来了！也许我们命不该绝……

15014.Name: Rally
15014.Info: Play a random Bronze unit from your deck.
15014.Flavor: 太阳出来了，德洛米！太阳出来了！也许我们命不该绝……

21001.Name: Dagon
21001.Flavor: 永世长眠者未必永恒死亡，在奇妙的时代死亡亦将消逝。

21002.Name: Arachas Queen
21002.Info:
Deploy: Consume 3 allies and boost self by their power.
Immune.
21002.Flavor: 她的孩子们完美继承了她的美貌。

21003.Name: Whispering Hillock
21003.Info: Deploy: Create a Bronze or Silver Organic card.
21003.Flavor: 它会在其它我们所无法触及的地方再次崛起。厄运会再次降临。

21004.Name: Eredin Bréacc Glas
21004.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Bronze Wild Hunt unit.
21004.Flavor: 留点尊严吧，你的结局已然注定。

21005.Name: Unseen Elder
21005.Info: Deploy: Drain a unit by half.
21005.Flavor: 没有谁知道暗影长者的真实年龄，连高阶吸血鬼们也不知情。他们唯一清楚的是，无论如何也不能违背他的意愿。

22001.Name: Old Speartip: Asleep
22001.Info: Deploy: Strengthen all your other Ogroids in hand, deck, and on board by 1.

22002.Name: Draug
22002.Info: Deploy: Resurrect units as 1-power Draugirs until you fill this unit's row.
22002.Flavor: 有些人就是不服输，死了还要继续打。

22003.Name: Old Speartip
22003.Info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage to up to 5 enemies on the opposite row.
22003.Flavor: 哦，你现在可有大麻烦了......

22004.Name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
22004.Info: Deploy: Move an enemy to the opposite row and apply Biting Frost to it.

22005.Name: Imlerith
22005.Info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If the Enemy is under a Frost Hazard, Destory it instead.

22006.Name: Whispess: Tribute
22006.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Organic card from your deck.
22006.Flavor: 我将是你最美……与最后的体验。

22007.Name: Kayran
22007.Info: Deploy: Consume a unit with 7 power or less and boost self by its power.
22007.Flavor: 对付巨章鱼怪？简单。找出你最好的剑——卖了它，雇个猎魔人。

22008.Name: Woodland Spirit
22008.Info: Deploy: Spawn 3 Wolves and apply a Fog to the opposite row.
22008.Flavor: 即便全村人都饿肚子，我们也绝不去这片树林打猎。

22009.Name: Imlerith: Sabbath
22009.Info: Every turn, on turn end, Duel the Highest enemy. If this unit survives, Heal it by 2 and give it 2 Armor. 2 Armor.
22009.Flavor: 老巫妪说过你会来。她们在水面上预见了你的到来。

22010.Name: Caretaker
22010.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver unit from your opponent's graveyard.
22010.Flavor: 大千世界，无奇不有，远超古圣今贤之想象。

22011.Name: Miruna
22011.Info: After 2 turns, on turn start, Charm the Highest enemy on the opposite row.
22011.Flavor: 打什么仗嘛？明明有更多好办法消耗过剩的精力……

22012.Name: Weavess: Incantation
22012.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Strengthen allied Relicts by 2, wherever they are; or Play a Bronze or Silver Relict from your deck and Strengthen it by 2.
22012.Flavor: 我能感受到你的痛苦和恐惧。

22013.Name: Ge'els
22013.Info: Deploy: Draw the top Gold card and top Silver card from your Deck. Play one and return the other to the top of your Deck.

22014.Name: Brewess: Ritual
22014.Flavor: 切烂……剁碎……然后熬出……一锅好汤。

23001.Name: Frightener
23001.Info: Spying. Single-Use. Deploy: Move an enemy to this unit's row and draw a card.
23001.Flavor: “我到底做了什么？”法师被自己的创造物吓得大叫起来。

23002.Name: Imperial Manticore
23002.Flavor: 世界上最古老且致命的怪物之一。倘若是过去，遇到一只定会让我兴奋无比。但如今它只是我前进路上的绊脚石，而它的肉和滚烫的鲜血能帮我熬过这冰天雪地。

23003.Name: Golyat
23003.Info:
Deploy: Boost self by 7.
Whenever this unit is damaged, deal 2 damage to self.
23003.Flavor: 据说哥亚特曾经是一位闻名遐迩的骑士。只可惜，有一天他触怒了湖中仙女，被变成了一头怪物。

23004.Name: Brewess
23004.Flavor: 切烂……剁碎……然后熬出……一锅好汤。

23005.Name: Colossal Ifrit
23005.Info: Deploy: Spawn 3 Lesser Ifrits to the right of this unit.
23005.Flavor: 受不了热浪？那就没生路了。

23006.Name: Ruehin
23006.Info: Deploy: Strengthen all your Insectoid and Cursed units by 1, wherever they are.
23006.Flavor: 进入那片森林的人，没一个活着回来……

23007.Name: Weavess
23007.Flavor: 我能感受到你的痛苦和恐惧。

23008.Name: Whispess
23008.Flavor: 我将是你最美……与最后的体验。

23009.Name: Jotunn
23009.Info: Deploy: Move 3 Enemies to this row on their side and Damage them by 2. If that row is affected by Frost Hazard, Damage them by 3 instead.
23009.Flavor: 在史凯利格的传说中，强大而恐怖的巨人之王约顿是群岛在上古时期的统治者。他最终死于汉姆多尔的剑下，但在弥留之际，他发誓要在终末之战时重返人间。

23010.Name: Morvudd
23010.Info: Deploy: Toggle a unit's Lock status. If it was an enemy, halve its power.
23010.Flavor: 一种只在大史凯利格出没的珍稀鹿首魔品种。对食物异乎寻常的挑剔。

23011.Name: Nithral
23011.Info: Deploy: Deal 6 damage to an enemy. Increase damage by 1 for each Wild Hunt unit in your hand.
23011.Flavor: 每个狂猎战士都要经过严格筛选，而只有最残暴、最凶狠的那些才能加入艾瑞汀的骑兵队。

23012.Name: Toad Prince
23012.Info: Deploy: Draw a unit, then Consume a unit in your hand and boost self by its power.
23012.Flavor: 又大又坏又丑，住在下水道里。

23013.Name: Adda: Striga
23013.Info: Deploy: Deal 8 damage to a non-Monster unit.
23013.Flavor: 吸血妖鸟挺好的。当然，她会时不时地在谁的身上咬一口，但我们早就习惯了。

23014.Name: Katakan
23014.Flavor: 天球交汇后，这些以鲜血为食的怪物便来到了我们的世界。

23015.Name: Ozzrel
23015.Info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze or Silver unit from either graveyard and boost self by its power.
23015.Flavor: 一些食腐生物袭击过人类后，便再也不满足于区区腐肉了……

23016.Name: Abaya
23016.Info: Deploy: Spawn Rain, Clear Skies or Arachas Venom.
23016.Flavor: 丑东西我见得多了，海鳝、七鳃鳗、水滴鱼……但还没见过这么丑的！

23017.Name: Mourntart
23017.Info: Deploy: Consume all Bronze and Silver units in your graveyard and boost self by 1 for each.
23017.Flavor: 大部分墓穴巫婆以墓穴中刨出来的尸体为食。但有些也会潜入小屋，偷走孩子，残害大人。因此基本上没人愿意和她们成为邻居。

23018.Name: Maerolorn
23018.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Deathwish unit from your Deck.
23018.Flavor: 别怕阴影，该怕的是亮光。

23019.Name: She-Troll of Vergen
23019.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Deathwish unit from your deck, Consume it and boost self by its base power

23020.Name: Devana Runestone
23020.Info: Deploy: Create a Bronze or Silver Monster card.
23020.Flavor: 我的剑实在是锋利，连纸都能裁开！

23021.Name: Monster Nest
23021.Info: Spawn a Bronze Necrophage or Insectoid unit and boost it by 1.
23021.Flavor: 该死，这些怪物泛滥成灾……我们得找个猎魔人，不然大家都活不成。

23022.Name: Parasite
23022.Info: Choose One: Deal 12 damage to an enemy; or Boost an ally by 12.

24001.Name: Cyclops
24001.Info: Deploy: Destroy an ally and deal its power as damage.
24001.Flavor: 别盯着它的眼睛，他不喜欢那样……

24002.Name: Fiend
24002.Flavor: 鹿首魔长得有点像鹿，一只又大又邪恶的鹿。

24003.Name: Ancient Foglet
24003.Info: On turn end, if Fog is on the board, Boost self by 1.
24003.Flavor: 人类心中潜藏着许多原始的恐惧。对迷雾的恐惧更是根深蒂固……

24004.Name: Archgriffin
24004.Info: Deploy: Clear Hazards on its row. Move a bronze unit card from the opponent's graveyard to your own graveyard.
24004.Flavor: 大狮鹫也是狮鹫，只是更加凶悍。

24005.Name: Wild Hunt Rider
24005.Info: Increase the damage dealt by Frost on the opposite row by 1.
24005.Flavor: 首先映入眼帘的是头盔旁的两只水牛角，接着是牛角间的头冠，最后是面甲下白骨般的脸。

24006.Name: Bridge Troll
24006.Info: Deploy: Move a Hazard on an enemy row to a different enemy row.
24006.Flavor: 桥桥？巨魔造，很久很久前。

24007.Name: Alpha Werewolf
24007.Info: Spawn a Wolf on either side on contact with Full Moon.
24007.Flavor: 有人说，如果被狼人咬了，那么你就会被感染，也变成狼人。当然，猎魔人都知道这是胡说八道。只有强大的诅咒才能造成这种效果。

24008.Name: 狮鹫
24008.Info: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of a Bronze Ally.
24008.Flavor: 狮鹫喜欢玩弄自己的猎物，将其一点一点地活生生啄食吞咽。

24009.Name: Nekker Warrior
24009.Info: Deploy: Choose a Bronze ally and add 2 copies of it to your deck.
24009.Flavor: 各位小心，这座桥下有孽鬼出没。

24010.Name: Arachas Behemoth
24010.Info: Whenever you Consume a unit, Spawn an Arachas Hatchling. Repeat up to 3 times.
24010.Flavor: 看起来像螃蟹和蜘蛛的杂交……只是体型硕大无比。

24011.Name: Rotfiend
24011.Info: Deathwish: Damage all units on the opposite row by 2.
24011.Flavor: 还没见到它们的踪影，恶臭就先远远地传过来了。

24012.Name: Forktail
24012.Info: Deploy: Consume 2 allies and boost self by their power.
24012.Flavor: 要想印叉尾龙上钩，得这样做：在地里打一根桩子，上头绑一只山羊，然后赶紧钻到旁边的灌木丛里藏起来。

24013.Name: Archespore
24013.Info:
On turn start, move to a random row and deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Deathwish: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
24013.Flavor: 根据民间传说，它们会在亡者鲜血的浇灌下破土而出。因此在拥有黑暗过往的地方，它们长得特别茂盛。

24014.Name: Drowner
24014.Info: Deploy: Move an enemy to the opposite row and deal 2 damage to it. If that row is under a Hazard, deal 4 damage instead.
24014.Flavor: 尽管猎魔人想多赚些金币，但杀水鬼这活儿只值一枚银币，或者三个铜板——不能再多了。

24015.Name: Wild Hunt Drakkar
24015.Info: Aura: Boost all Wild Hunt allies by 1
24015.Flavor: 鬼船纳吉尔法的船头劈开波浪，将海水破成两道。号角响彻天际，汉姆多尔站在燃烧的彩虹之上，迎接敌人的来犯。白霜降临，狂风和暴雨近在咫尺……

24016.Name: Wild Hunt Warrior
24016.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If the enemy is destroyed or is under Frost, boost self by 2.

24017.Name: Werewolf
24017.Info: Boost by 7 on contact with Full Moon. Immune.
24017.Flavor: 有人说，如果被狼人咬了，那么你就会被感染，也变成狼人。当然，猎魔人都知道这是胡说八道。只有强大的诅咒才能造成这种效果。

24018.Name: Celaeno Harpy
24018.Flavor: 一般的鹰身女妖以腐肉为食，赛尔伊诺鹰身女妖……则以梦境为食。

24019.Name: Cockatrice
24019.Flavor: 头部拥有超强的防抖能力，因此总能轻易命中目标的腰椎之间、左肾下面，或是主动脉。

24020.Name: D'ao
24020.Flavor: 怎么跟土元素打？別想了，跑吧，能跑多快跑多快。

24021.Name: Ice Giant
24021.Info: Deploy: For every Biting Frost on the Board, gain 3 points. Every time a Biting Frost appears on the Board, gain 3 points.
24021.Flavor: 我这辈子只当过一次逃兵，就是碰上寒冰巨人那次——我一点也没觉得丢人。

24022.Name: Vran Warrior
24022.Info: Deploy: Consume the Unit to the right. Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Consume the Unit to the right.
24022.Flavor: 他们静静地骑在马上，看起来很放松，但全副武装：宽头短矛、剑柄独特的剑、战斧以及锯齿长斧。

24023.Name: Wyvern
24023.Flavor: 想象一下在最可怕的噩梦中出现的长翅膀的蛇——翼手龙比这更可怕。

24024.Name: Lamia
24024.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If the enemy is under Blood Moon, deal 7 damage instead.
24024.Flavor: 有个迷信的家伙用蜡堵住耳朵，结果什么也听不到，包括警告——他的船直接撞上了礁石。

24025.Name: Barbegazi
24025.Info: Deploy: Consume an ally and boost self by its power. Resilient.
24025.Flavor: 岩洞中先前还和石头没什么两样的怪物，倏地瞪大眼睛，充满恶意地盯着他。

24026.Name: Ekimmara
24026.Flavor: 谁能想到巨型蝙蝠也会喜欢俗艳的珠宝？

24027.Name: Werecat
24027.Info: Deploy: Deal 5 damage to an enemy, then deal 1 damage to all enemies under Blood Moon.
24027.Flavor: 他不喜欢你挠他的肚子。

24028.Name: Foglet
24028.Info: Whenever you apply Fog to an enemy row, Summon a copy of this unit from your deck.
24028.Flavor: 浓雾悄然弥漫时，小雾妖便会出没，来享用它们的受害者。

24029.Name: Ghoul
24029.Info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze or Silver Unit from your Graveyard.
24029.Flavor: 如果食尸鬼也是生死循环的一环……那这循环也太残酷了。

24030.Name: Harpy
24030.Info: Summon a copy of this unit whenever you destroy an allied Beast.
24030.Flavor: 鹰身女妖有很多种，每种都有窃盗癖。

24031.Name: Nekker
24031.Info:
Whenever you Consume a card, boost this unit by 1, wherever it is.
Deathwish: Play a copy of this unit from your deck.
24031.Flavor: 如果忽略它们会攻击人类的残酷事实，这些小家伙其实挺可爱的。

24032.Name: Wild Hunt Hound
24032.Info: Deploy: Play a Biting Frost card from your Deck.

24033.Name: Siren
24033.Info: Deploy: Play Moonlight from your deck.
24033.Flavor: 传说她们会用诱人的歌声引水手们上钩……倒不如说，是她们身上一些更加诱人的地方迷住了水手。

24034.Name: Ice Troll
24034.Info: Deploy: Duel an enemy. If it is under Frost, deal double damage.
24034.Flavor: 巨魔形形色色，身材、嗜好各有不同。不过它们的脑子都和一桶锈钉子差不了多少。

24035.Name: Arachas Drone
24035.Info: Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit.
24035.Flavor: 丑陋的外表即是警告，叫你“离远点”。

24036.Name: Wild Hunt Navigator
24036.Info: Deploy: Choose a non-Mage Wild Hunt ally and play a copy of it from your deck.
24036.Flavor: 几百年来，阿瓦拉克一直试图通过回育之术重塑长者之血的基因——但由此抚育出的精灵孩子不过是萤火灯烛，全然无法与劳拉光辉耀眼的血统相提并论。

24037.Name: Slyzard
24037.Info: Deploy: Consume a different Bronze unit from your graveyard, then play a copy of it from your deck.
24037.Flavor: 不管多强壮的人，不管他的本领多么高强，都不可能在飞蜥尾巴的抽打、巨蝎的大螯、或是狮鹫的爪子下保住性命。

24038.Name: Moonlight
24038.Info: Choose One: Apply a Full Moon Boon; or Apply a Blood Moon Hazard.
24038.Flavor: 满月的时候，梦魇便会从世界的各个角落匍匐而出。

25001.Name: Lesser D'ao
25001.Flavor: 它很容易被误认作岩石，许多糊涂巨魔已痛彻心扉地领悟到这一点。

25002.Name: Arachas Drone
25002.Info: Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit.
25002.Flavor: 有时候，“年轻即是美”不过是大自然的谎言罢了。

25003.Name: Draugir
25003.Flavor: 战鬼是战之恶魔。它们会出现在极度血腥惨烈的战场上，由万千憎恨凝结而成，嗜血成性。

25004.Name: Harpy Egg
25004.Info:
When Consumed by another Unit, Boost that Unit by an additional 5.
Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on a random row.
25004.Flavor: 鹰身女妖蛋卷，真是美味佳肴啊，好先生。但它也非常昂贵，您可能料得到，这些可怜的鸟儿并不愿跟自己的蛋分离。

25005.Flavor: 有时候，“年轻即是美”不过是大自然的谎言罢了。

25006.Name: Lesser Ifrit
25006.Info: When summoned deal 1 damage to a random enemy
25006.Flavor: 曾经有个法师觉得它们可爱，而他的命运催生了一句俗语：“不要玩火自焚。”

25007.Name: Rabid Wolf
25007.Flavor: “放心，我知道怎么驯狼……”——猎人邓巴的遗言。

25008.Name: Blood Moon
25008.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2 damage to all units on contact.
25008.Flavor: 满月的时候，梦魇便会从世界的各个角落匍匐而出。

25009.Name: Full Moon
25009.Info: Apply a Boon to an allied row that boosts a random Beast or Vampire by 2 on turn start.
25009.Flavor: 满月的时候，梦魇便会从世界的各个角落匍匐而出。

31002.Name: Emhyr var Emreis
31002.Info: Deploy: Play a card from your hand, then return a Bronze or Silver ally to your hand.
31002.Flavor: 我没什么耐心。把我惹毛了，小心小命不保。

31003.Name: Morvran Voorhis
31003.Flavor: 夏日阳光在阿尔巴河平静的水面上熠熠生辉——我印象中的尼弗迦德就是这样啊。

31001.Name: Jan Calveit
31001.Info: Deploy: Look at 3 cards from your deck, then play 1.
31001.Flavor: 剑只是统治者的工具之一。

31004.Name: Usurper
31004.Info: Spying. Deploy: Create any Leader and boost it by 2.
31004.Flavor: 王权怎能单凭出身的贵贱来随便决定？

32002.Name: Xarthisius
32002.Info: Deploy: Look at your opponent's deck and move a card to the bottom.
32002.Flavor: 占卜术、水卜术、肠卜术、蜡卜术、蛋卜术、烬卜术、尿卜术、雷卜术……

32003.Name: Vattier de Rideaux
32003.Info: Deploy: Reveal up to 2 of your cards, then Reveal the same number of your opponent's randomly.
32003.Flavor: 精心策划的暗算能解决所有麻烦。

32004.Name: Stefan Skellen
32004.Info: Deploy: Choose a card from your deck, boost it by 5 and move it to the top of your deck.
32004.Flavor: 我在我们未来皇后的脸上留下了伤疤，这是我最引以为傲的成就。

32005.Name: Tibor Eggebracht
32005.Info: Deploy, Truce: Boost self by 15, then your opponent draws a Revealed Bronze card.
32005.Flavor: 蒂博尔以狂热的忠诚而闻名。据说皇帝驾崩时，他深深地鞠躬致敬，几乎可以说贴在了地上。

32006.Name: Vilgefortz
32006.Info: Deploy: Destroy an ally, then play a card from your deck; or Truce: Destroy an enemy, then your opponent draws a Revealed Bronze card.
32006.Flavor: 我们都是他棋盘上的棋子，而这棋局的规则，我们一无所知。

32007.Name: Shilard
32007.Info: Deploy, Truce: Draw a card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
32007.Flavor: 所谓外交官，就是用华丽的辞藻，来透露一些只言片语。

32008.Name: Menno Coehoorn
32008.Info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If it is Spying, Destroy it.
32008.Flavor: 细心的侦察分队比训练有素的军团更管用。

32009.Name: Leo Bonhart
32009.Info: Deploy: Reveal one of your units and deal damage equal to its base power to an enemy.
32009.Flavor: 他就坐在那里，死盯着我，一言不发。他的眼睛，好像……鱼眼，没有眉毛，没有睫毛……活脱脱两颗水球包裹的黑石头。一片死寂中，他就那样凝视着我，这却比被痛打我一顿更让我不寒而栗。

32001.Name: Rainfarn of Attre
32001.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Spying unit from your deck.
32001.Flavor: 辛特拉沦陷后，亚特里随即告破，这里的守军若不听任尼弗迦德人驱策，就只能去死。

32010.Name: Yennefer: Enchantress
32010.Info: Deploy: Spawn the last Bronze or Silver Spell you played.
32010.Flavor: 最好不要挡叶奈法的道。特别是当她忙着赶路的时候。

32011.Name: Letho: Kingslayer
32011.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Destroy an enemy Leader, then boost self by 5; or Play a Bronze or Silver Tactic from your deck.
32011.Flavor: 这僧侣为什么戴着镶钉手套……？

32012.Name: Yennefer: Divination
32012.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Soldier from your opponent's graveyard.
32012.Flavor: 身体已经开始腐烂……但声带依然完好。说不定我们还能让他开口说话……

32013.Name: Cahir Dyffryn
32013.Flavor: 他的双眼在翼盔下熠熠生辉，剑刃上反射着火光。

32014.Name: Letho of Gulet
32014.Info: Double agent. Deploy: Toggle 2 units' Lock on the row, then Drain all their power.
32014.Flavor: 猎魔人绝不会死在自己的床上。

32015.Name: Treason
32015.Flavor: “请你出手要多少钱？” “看情况喽。比如说目标是你，大改100奥伦币左右。”

33004.Name: Cantarella
33004.Info: Spying. Single-Use. Deploy: Draw 2 cards. Keep one and move the other to the bottom of your deck.
33004.Flavor: 男人渴望着诱惑，神秘加优雅往往事半功倍。

33005.Name: Assire var Anahid
33005.Info: Deploy: Return 2 Bronze or Silver cards from either graveyard to their respective decks.
33005.Flavor: 尼弗迦德法师也有选择：要么服从，要么上断头台。

33003.Name: The Guardian
33003.Info: Deploy: Add a Lesser Guardian to the top of your opponent's deck.
33003.Flavor: 石拳阻挡刀剑，逻辑战胜谎言。

33006.Name: Albrich
33006.Info: Deploy, Truce: Each player draws a card. The opponent's card is Revealed.
33006.Flavor: 火球？没问题。陛下想要什么都行。

33007.Name: Sweers
33007.Info: Deploy: Choose an enemy or a Revealed unit in your opponent's hand, then move all copies of it from from their deck to the graveyard.
33007.Flavor: 别碰那女孩！听明白没，你们这群乡巴佬？

33008.Name: Henry var Attre
33008.Info: Deploy: Conceal any number of units. If allies, boost by 2. If enemies, deal 2 damage.
33008.Flavor: 我在诺维格瑞驻守了十三年，什么我没见过？残忍、讥嘲、贪欲。可如今发生的事情却让我极度不安

33002.Name: False Ciri
33002.Info:
Spying. If Spying, boost self by 1 on turn start and when your opponent passes, move to the opposite row.
Deathwish: Destroy the Lowest unit on the row.
33002.Flavor: “她来了，”他心想，“皇帝的联姻对象。冒牌公主、冒牌的辛特拉女王、冒牌的雅鲁加河口统治者，也是帝国未来的命脉。”

33009.Name: Hefty Helge
33009.Info: Deploy: If this Unit was Revealed, Damage all Enemies by 1. Otherwise, Damage all Enemies except those on opposite row by 1.
33009.Flavor: 并非攻城的最佳选择，却是毁城的行家里手。

33010.Name: Auckes
33010.Flavor: 雷索已有计划……还能出什么岔子？

33011.Name: Peter Saar Gwynleve
33011.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Reset an ally and Strengthen it by 3; or Reset an enemy and Weaken it by 3.
33011.Flavor: 这双手不属于什么“阁下”，只属于一介农夫。所以这是农夫与农夫间的对话。

33012.Name: Serrit
33012.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Deal 7 damage to an enemy or set a Revealed opposing unit to 1.
33012.Flavor: 这是我们必须做的，我并不为此感到羞愧。

33013.Name: Cynthia
33013.Info: Deploy: Reveal the Highest Unit in your opponent's Hand and Boost self by its Power.
33013.Flavor: 决不能轻视辛西亚，必须把她看紧点儿。

33001.Name: Joachim de Wett
33001.Info: Spying. Deploy: Play the top non-Spying Bronze or Silver unit from your deck and boost it by 10.
33001.Flavor: 即便用“无能”来形容德·维特公爵对维登集团军的领导，都算给他面子

33014.Name: Vrygheff
33014.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Machine from your deck
33014.Flavor: 以眼还眼，我们最后一定会全都变成瞎子。

33015.Name: Vanhemar
33015.Info: Deploy: Spawn Frost, Clear Skies or Overdose.
33015.Flavor: 作为火法师，他算不上……多么热烈。

33016.Name: Vreemde
33016.Info: Deploy: Create a Bronze Nilfgaardian Soldier.
33016.Flavor: 即便要击败你们每一个人，我也要让伟大日轮照耀北境。

33017.Name: Ceallach Dyffryn
33017.Info: Deploy: Spawn an Ambassador, Assassin or Emissary.
33017.Flavor: “陛下……”皇家总管呜咽着说。直到刚才为止，根本没人留意他。“求您发发慈悲……卡西尔……我的儿子……”

33018.Name: Fringilla Vigo
33018.Info: Double agent. Deploy: Copy the power from the unit to the left to the unit to the right.
33018.Flavor: 魔法的价值高于一切，高于所有争论和敌意。

33019.Name: Dazhbog Runestone
33019.Info: Create and play a Bronze Nilfgaard card.

33020.Name: Treason
33020.Info: Force 2 adjacent enemies to Duel each other.
33020.Flavor: 许多人相信，帝国的实力在于纪律严明的军队与恪尽职守的法师。但事实上，金钱才是尼弗迦德统治世界的关键。

33021.Name: Cadaverine
33021.Info: Deal 3 damage to an enemy and all units that share its categories; or destroy a Bronze or Silver Neutral unit.
33021.Flavor: 我不会拿自己的性命去碰运气。我会拿上一把长剑，厚厚地涂上一层吊死鬼之毒。

33022.Name: Nilfgaardian Gate
33022.Info: Play a Bronze or Silver Officer from your deck and boost it by 1.

33023.Name: Slave Driver
33023.Info: Deploy: Set an ally's power to 1 and deal damage to an enemy by the amount of power lost.
33023.Flavor: 奴隶贩子只有一个追求：那就是把他的命令一丝不苟地执行下去。

34004.Name: Nilfgaardian Knight
34004.Info: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your hand. 2 Armor.
34004.Flavor: 出自名门望族，生于金塔之城，组成帝国的精锐部队。

34006.Name: Master of Disguise
34006.Flavor: 哦，高悬上苍的伟大日轮啊，把我们从裤腿里除之不尽的虱子中解救出来吧！

34007.Name: Alba Spearman
34007.Info: Boost self by 1 whenever either player draws a card.

34008.Name: Infiltrator
34008.Info: Deploy: Toggle a unit's Spying status.
34008.Flavor: 你可以一直逃，但你永远藏不了。

34009.Name: Alchemist
34009.Flavor: 两盎司钙素，一盎司结合剂……

34010.Name: Standard Bearer
34010.Info: Boost an ally by 2 whenever you play a Soldier.
34010.Flavor: “你要拼上性命，保卫这面军旗！Gloir aen Ard Feain！”

34011.Name: Rot Tosser
34011.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Cow Carcass on an enemy row.
34011.Flavor: 向围城中散播瘟疫是否人道，这个话题还是留给史学家吧。我们只关心这法子有没有效。

34012.Name: Slave Hunter
34012.Info: Deploy: Charm a Bronze enemy with 3 power or less.
34012.Flavor: 诀窍在于摧残他们的意志，而不是肉体

34013.Name: Sentry
34013.Info: Deploy: Boost all copies of a Soldier by 2

34014.Name: Alba Armored Cavalry
34014.Info: Whenever an ally appears, boost self by 1.
34014.Flavor: 他们以雷动之势冲进敌军方阵，犹如一把尖刀插入柔软的肚腹。阿尔巴之师所向披靡，一路横扫，直取泰莫利亚步兵团的咽喉。

34015.Name: Deithwen Arbalest
34015.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If it is Spying, deal 8 damage instead.

34016.Name: Mangonel
34016.Info:
Deploy: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Repeat this ability whenever you Reveal this card.
34016.Flavor: 适用于投掷残骸和干粪。

34017.Name: Nauzicaa Sergeant
34017.Info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from its row and boost an ally or a Revealed unit by 3.
34017.Flavor: 皇帝会教北方人懂点儿规矩的。

34018.Name: Combat Engineer
34018.Info: Deploy: Toggle Resilience of a friendly unit. Crew.
34018.Flavor: 战争是文明进步的确凿证据——看看吧，现在大伙儿打仗更有效率了。

34003.Name: Impera Brigade
34003.Info:
Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each Spying Enemy.
Whenever a Spying Enemy appears, Boost self by 2.

34005.Name: Impera Enforcers
34005.Info:
Deploy: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
For each Spying enemy that appears during your turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
34005.Flavor: 皇帝最忠诚的贴身护卫，誓死保卫皇帝的安全。

34019.Name: Fire Scorpion
34019.Info:
Deploy: Deal 5 damage to an enemy.
Whenever you Reveal this unit, trigger its ability.
34019.Flavor: 名字与实物可谓风马牛不相及，听上去它好像是某种肥大的红色甲壳生物，但其实是一种由能工巧匠精心设计的大规模杀伤性武器……

34020.Name: Nauzicaa Brigade
34020.Info: Deploy: Damage a Spying Unit by 7. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen self by 4.
34020.Flavor: 我们被称作死神头。想知道为什么吗？

34021.Name: Spotter
34021.Info: Deploy: Choose a bronze or silver Revealed Unit in either Hand and Boost self by its base Power.

34022.Name: Viper Witcher
34022.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage for each Alchemy card in your starting deck.
34022.Flavor: 毒蛇学派将会重生……雷索志在必得。

34023.Name: Daerlan Soldier
34023.Info: Whenever you Reveal this unit, play it on a random row and draw a card.
34023.Flavor: 我在布莱班特军事学院学到了不少东西，比如洗土豆

34024.Name: Alba Pikeman
34024.Info: At the beginning of the round, summon one copy from the deck. 2 armor.
34024.Flavor: 宣誓效忠吾皇恩希尔·恩瑞斯……不然就受刑吧！

34025.Name: Imperial Golem
34025.Info: Summon a copy of this unit whenever you Reveal a card in your opponent's hand.
34025.Flavor: 尼弗迦德最强大的法师们终于成功掌握了制造魔像的方法。更棒的是，他们已经“偶尔”能让这些魔像为帝国而战了……

34026.Name: Magne Division
34026.Info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Item from your deck.
34026.Flavor: 皇帝固然应该胸怀天下……但派人守卫这么一块不毛之地，实在是浪费资源。

34027.Name: Slave Infantry
34027.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Doomed default copy of this unit on your other rows.
34027.Flavor: 自由人可以选择。奴隶只能由别人替他们决定。

34028.Name: Ambassador
34028.Info: Spying. Deploy: Boost an ally by 12.
34028.Flavor: 间谍？不，这么说就太过啦。我觉得自己不过是个观察员而已。

34002.Name: Emissary
34002.Info: Spying. Deploy: Look at 2 random Bronze units from your deck, then play 1.
34002.Flavor: 但是……这样不对啊！两国交兵不斩来使！

34001.Name: Vicovaro Novice
34001.Info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 Bronze Alchemy cards from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
34001.Flavor: 尼弗迦德的法师们就像手纸。一旦谁被皇帝厌倦，立刻有大把新人迫不及待地赶来补缺。

34029.Name: Assassin
34029.Info: Spying. Deploy: Deal 10 damage to the unit to the left.
34029.Flavor: 帝国宫廷最受欢迎的职业之一，仅次于抄书吏和轻浮的贵妇。

34030.Name: Vicovaro Medic
34030.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
34030.Flavor: 这个世界的瘟疫跟战争一样多，夺人性命也一样地出其不意。

34031.Name: Venendal Elite
34031.Info: Deploy: Switch this unit's power with that of a Revealed unit.
34031.Flavor: 艾宾以其顶尖的雇佣兵和轻骑兵闻名天下。

34032.Name: Recruit
34032.Info: Deploy: Play a random different Bronze Soldier from your deck.
34032.Flavor: 他也不问为什么，只能……一个接一个地削那该死的马铃薯。

34033.Name: Ointment
34033.Info: Resurrect a Bronze unit with 5 power or less.
34033.Flavor: 它管用吗？谁知道呢。反正试试也没坏处。可能吧。

35001.Name: Lesser Guardian
35001.Flavor: 按理说死去的守卫者不该再坚守岗位，但魔法可往往不会遵循常理……

35002.Name: Cow Carcass
35002.Info: After 2 turns, destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the row (except self). Banish when moved to the graveyard.
35002.Flavor: 那是只鸟？还是头狮鹫？不对！那是……

41001.Name: King Radovid V
41001.Info: Deploy: Toggle 2 units' Lock statuses. If enemies, deal 4 damage to them. Crew.
41001.Flavor: 身为国王，对待敌人应冷酷无情，对待朋友当慷慨大度。

41002.Name: Princess Adda
41002.Info: Deploy: Create a Bronze or Silver Cursed unit.
41002.Flavor: 她的诅咒被解除了……但是喜欢吃生肉的习惯却没改掉。

41003.Name: King Foltest
41003.Info: Deploy: Boost all other allies and your non-Spying units in hand and deck by 1. Crew.
41003.Flavor: 我不需要谋臣和他们的诡计，我相信士兵的利刃。

41004.Name: King Henselt
41004.Info: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Machine or Kaedweni ally and play all copies of it from your deck. Crew.
41004.Flavor: 恕我直言，亨赛特国王不是看起来像贼，他本就是贼。

42001.Name: Dandelion
42001.Info: Deploy: Boost 3 units in your deck by 2.
42001.Flavor: 丹德里恩，你愤世嫉俗、好色成性又谎话连篇——却也是我最好的朋友。

42002.Name: Bloody Baron
42002.Info: Whenever an enemy is destroyed, boost self by 1, wherever it is.
42002.Flavor: 我知道自己不是个好父亲，但……现在弥补或许还来得及。

42003.Name: Seltkirk of Gulet
42003.Flavor: 尽管赛尔奇克美德过人，更是有着不屈的勇气，然而他还是和所有命丧上亚甸之战的将士一样，没能逃过自己的命运。

42004.Name: Vandergrift
42004.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If a unit is destroyed, apply Ragh Nar Roog to its row.
42004.Flavor: 将军本以为洛马克的战争会很快结束，不会有什么损失……结果却陷入了永恒的征战。

42005.Name: John Natalis
42005.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Tactics card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
42005.Flavor: 那座广场应以我的士兵及其他牺牲者来命名，而不是顶着我的名字。

42006.Name: Keira Metz
42006.Info: Deploy: Spawn Alzur's Thunder, Thunderbolt or Arachas Venom.
42006.Flavor: 即便今天死，我也要死得光鲜亮丽。

42007.Name: Roche: Merciless
42007.Info: Deploy: Destroy a face-down Ambush enemy.
42007.Flavor: 我们内心从不畏惧。不过，倒是有一个人类……弗农·罗契。千万要当心他。

42008.Name: Sigismund Dijkstra
42008.Info: Spying. Deploy: Play 2 random cards from your deck.
42008.Flavor: 你真以为这种下三滥的谎话能糊弄我？

42009.Name: Shani
42009.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a non-Cursed Bronze or Silver unit and give it 2 Armor.

42010.Name: Kiyan
42010.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Create a Bronze or Silver Alchemy card; or Play a Bronze or Silver Item from your deck.
42010.Flavor: 我们生活在无尽黑色大海中一座宁静的世外小岛上。我们不该扬帆远航。

42011.Name: Priscilla
42011.Flavor: 想像一下穿裙子的丹德里恩，大概就是那副模样。

42012.Name: Vernon Roche
42012.Info:
Deploy: Deal 7 damage.
At the start of the game, add a Blue Stripes Commando to your deck.
42012.Flavor: 一位爱国者……也是个令人头疼的家伙。

42013.Name: Philippa Eilhart
42013.Info: Deploy: Deal 5 damage to an enemy, then deal 4, 3, 2 and 1 damage to random enemies.
42013.Flavor: 王族的权势即将凋零，女术士集会所必将崛起。

43001.Name: Thaler
43001.Info: Spying. Single-Use. Deploy: Draw 2 cards, keep one and return the other to your deck.
43001.Flavor: 滚开！我们中间不是每个人都那么轻浮、那么浅薄……

43002.Name: Ves
43002.Flavor: 宁似帝王快活一天，强如乞丐苟活一世。

43003.Name: Trollololo
43003.Info: 4 Armor. At the start of your turn, gain 2 Armor.
43003.Flavor: 我是拉多多德国王的兵兵。收到命令，看守船船。

43004.Name: Ronvid the Incessant
43004.Info: On turn end, Resurrect on a random row with 1 power. Crew.
43004.Flavor: 这位自封的骑士四海漂泊，捍卫着心爱少女比贝莉的荣誉。虽然没人知道她住在哪里，她是不是哈活着，甚至是不是曾经有过这个人。

43005.Name: Botchling
43005.Flavor: 承认错误，妥善安葬——否则他们会回来缠着你不放。

43006.Name: Nenneke
43006.Info: Deploy: Return 3 Bronze or Silver units from the graveyard to your deck.
43006.Flavor: 南尼克的医术无人可及。

43007.Name: Foltest's Pride
43007.Info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3 and move it to the row above. Crewed: Repeat its ability.
43007.Flavor: 正如弗尔泰斯特国王常说的那样，尺寸并不重要，关键要好用。

43008.Name: Vincent Meis
43008.Info: Deploy: Destroy the Armor of all units, then boost self by half the value destroyed.
43008.Flavor: 白天是维吉玛城卫兵队长。到了晚上，便化身为无情的复仇者，保卫受尽压迫的劳苦大众。

43009.Name: Odrin
43009.Info:
On turn start, move to a random row and boost all allies on it by 1. 
Deathwish: boost all allies on the same row by 1.
43009.Flavor: 喝酒少了欧德林，就像划船没带桨。

43010.Name: Hubert Rejk
43010.Info: Deploy: Drain all boosts from units in your deck.
43010.Flavor: 验尸官是个冷静、淡定的人。就算是尸体，也会精心照料。

43011.Name: Margarita of Aretuza
43011.Info: Deploy: Reset a unit and toggle its Lock status.
43011.Flavor: 我只关心艾瑞图萨学院和我的学生们。

43012.Name: Lubberkin
43012.Flavor: 吾为汝取名蒂雅，收汝为吾女。

43013.Name: Dethmold
43013.Info: Deploy: Spawn Rain, Clear Skies or Alzur's Thunder.
43013.Flavor: 我曾让一个囚犯搜肠刮肚地狂吐……啊，好怀念……

43014.Name: Síle de Tansarville
43014.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver special card from your hand, then draw a card.
43014.Flavor: 女术士集会所缺乏谦逊，对权力的渴望可能会让我们功亏一篑。

43015.Name: Princess Pavetta
43015.Info: Deploy: Return each player's Lowest Bronze or Silver unit to their deck.
43015.Flavor: 他们说公主容易动怒，但我没想到……

43016.Name: Prince Stennis
43016.Info: Deploy: Play a random non-Spying Bronze or Silver unit from your deck and give it 5 Armor. 3 Armor.
43016.Flavor: 他穿着黄金铠甲——没错，混账一个。

43017.Name: Sabrina Glevissig
43017.Info: Spying. Deathwish: Set the power of all units on the row to the power of the Lowest unit on the row.

43018.Name: Sabrina's Specter
43018.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Cursed unit.
43018.Flavor: 萨宾娜·葛丽维希格用尽最后一口气，释放出一道强大的诅咒，不但处刑人遭了殃，留在附近的所有人也都没能幸免。

43019.Name: Zoria Runestone
43019.Info: Create a Bronze or Silver Northern Realms card.
43019.Flavor: 这块符文石让我不寒而栗……我是不是做了什么伤它感情的事？

43020.Name: Reinforcements
43020.Info: Play a Bronze or Silver Soldier, Machine, Officer or Support unit from your deck.
43020.Flavor: 吹号撤退！重新集结！等待增援！

43021.Name: Vandergrift's Blade
43021.Info: Choose One: Destroy a Bronze or Silver Cursed enemy; or Deal 10 damage. If the unit was destroyed, Banish it.
43021.Flavor: 在阿德卡莱的一次骑士比武中，赛尔奇克打断了范德格里夫特的长剑。于是，愤怒的范德格里夫特下令铸造一把新的兵刃，还在上面附了强大的符文石。

44001.Name: Tridam Infantry
44001.Flavor: 他们本是忠于崔丹姆老男爵的士兵，随法利波离开城市后，如今却成了被悬赏的叛徒。

44002.Name: Ban Ard Tutor
44002.Info: Deploy: Swap a card in your hand with a Bronze special card from your deck.
44002.Flavor: 我一直拿艾瑞图萨学院的女生和班·阿德的愣头小子们作对比。结果总是姑娘们胜出。

44003.Name: Kaedweni Sergeant
44003.Info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from its row. 3 Armor. Crew.
44003.Flavor: 冲锋，没用的蠢货！冲锋，不然你就会知道，我比尼弗迦德人更可怕！

44004.Name: Kaedweni Cavalry
44004.Info: Deploy: Destroy a unit's Armor, then boost self by the amount destroyed.
44004.Flavor: 我一直很好奇，这帮家伙是怎么解决内急的？

44005.Name: Field Medic
44005.Flavor: 红缝红，白缝白，活儿真不赖。

44006.Name: Redanian Elite
44006.Info: Whenever this unit's Armor reaches 0, boost self by 5. 4 Armor.
44006.Flavor: 为了瑞达尼亚，不论上刀山下油锅，还是吃虫子，我都在所不惜。

44007.Name: Siege Tower
44007.Info: Deploy: Boost self by 2. Crewed: Repeat its ability.

44008.Name: Reinforced Trebuchet
44008.Info: On turn end, Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
44008.Flavor: 感受到了吗？每当这宝贝儿投出巨石，大地都会震颤。

44009.Name: Kaedweni Knight
44009.Info: Boost this unit by 5 if played from the deck. 2 Armor.
44009.Flavor: 科德温军队里并非所有人都认同国王的政治手段。然而谁都不敢说出来。

44010.Name: Cursed Knight
44010.Info: Deploy: Transform a Cursed ally into a copy of this unit. 2 Armor.
44010.Flavor: 深陷无尽的战斗，却早已忘记了起因。

44011.Name: Siege Support
44011.Info: Whenever an ally appears, boost it by 1. If it's a Machine, also give it 1 Armor. Crew.
44011.Flavor: “你得把准星左校5度。”“把什么调多少？”

44012.Name: Redanian Knight
44012.Info: On turn end, if this unit has no Armor, boost it by 2 and give it 2 Armor.
44012.Flavor: 为了荣耀，为了拉多维德陛下！

44013.Name: Redanian Knight-Elect
44013.Info: On turn end, if this unit has Armor, boost adjacent units by 1. 2 Armor.
44013.Flavor: 不为名不为利，高尚的动机才能成就英雄！

44014.Name: Reinforced Ballista
44014.Info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2. 
Crewed: Repeat the Deploy ability.
44014.Flavor: 从没两次命中同一处，仔细想想，真是个大问题。

44015.Name: Trebuchet
44015.Info:
Deploy: Damage 3 Adjacent Enemies by 1. 
Crewed: Increase the Damage dealt by 1.
44015.Flavor: 城堡可是块硬骨头。快去准备投石机！

44016.Name: Aedirnian Mauler
44016.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
44016.Flavor: 呃，这些家伙真让人头疼。

44017.Name: Ballista
44017.Info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy and up to 4 other random Enemies with the same Power by 1. 
Crewed: Repeat the Deploy ability.
44017.Flavor: 成为弩炮是所有十字弩的终极梦想。

44018.Name: Battering Ram
44018.Info:
Deploy: Deal 3 damage. If the unit was destroyed, deal 3 damage to another unit. 
Crewed: Increase initial damage by 1.
44018.Flavor: 不肯开门是吧？那我们就再加把劲敲一敲啰。

44019.Name: Siege Master
44019.Info: Deploy: Heal an allied Bronze or Silver Machine and repeat its ability. Crew.

44020.Name: Poor Fucking Infantry
44020.Info: Deploy: Spawn Left Flank Infantry and Right Flank Infantry to the left and right of this unit, respectively.
44020.Flavor: 看在我是老兵的份上！打赏个一克朗吧？

44021.Name: Reaver Hunter
44021.Info: Deploy: Boost all copies of this unit by 1, wherever they are. Repeat its ability whenever a copy of this unit is played.
44021.Flavor: 看见这纹身没？纹的是我在痛扁一条龙。一条龙哟，女士。

44022.Name: Temerian Drummer
44022.Flavor: 他告诉妈妈，自己想当个音乐家。只是没料到演奏的是这种乐器。

44023.Name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry
44023.Info: On turn start, if you are losing by more than 25, Summon this unit to a random row.
44023.Flavor: 冷静，所有人保持警惕！这可能是那帮披斗篷戴海狸皮帽的家伙的陷阱……

44024.Name: Kaedweni Revenant
44024.Info: When you play your next Spell or Item, Spawn a Doomed default copy of this unit on its row. 1 Armor.
44024.Flavor: 万劫不复的士兵日复一日地过着同一天，就好像奇安凡尼银行的职员一样。

44025.Name: Damned Sorceress
44025.Info: Deploy: If there is a Cursed unit on this unit's row, deal 7 damage. Increase the damage by 1 for each extra Cursed unit on the same row.
44025.Flavor: 萨宾娜的诅咒谁也不放过，就连其他的女术士也难以幸免。

44026.Name: Aretuza Adept
44026.Info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Hazard card from your Deck.
44026.Flavor: 这些女学员在艾瑞图萨活得像公主一样，任何怪诞的想法都能得到满足，同时半个城市都在服务于她们：裁缝、帽商、糖果商、贩夫走卒……

44027.Name: Blue Stripe Commando
44027.Info: Whenever a different Temerian ally with the same power is played, Summon a copy of this unit from your deck.
44027.Flavor: 我愿为泰莫利亚赴汤蹈火，不过大多时候是在排除异己。

44028.Name: Blue Stripe Scout
44028.Info: Deploy: Boost all Temerian allies and your non-Spying Temerian units in hand and deck with the same power as this unit by 1. Crew.
44028.Flavor: 蓝衣铁卫与松鼠党有个共通点——满心仇恨。

44029.Name: Temerian Infantry
44029.Info: Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit.
44029.Flavor: 泰莫利亚！泰莫利亚！诸神恩赐汝等！降怒于敌，使其永世灾厄！

44030.Name: Witch Hunter
44030.Info: Deploy: Reset a Unit. If it's a Mage, play another Witch Hunter from your Deck.
44030.Flavor: 女巫猎人都是些什么人？大部分都是流氓无赖、狂热分子。然而看到女术士集会所犯下的肮脏罪行，不少怒不可遏的体面人也加入了他们的行列……

44031.Name: Tormented Mage
44031.Info: Deploy: Look at 2 Bronze Spells or Items from your deck, then play 1.
44031.Flavor: 萨宾娜·葛丽维希格的诅咒摧枯拉朽。面对这股怒火，就连法师们也束手无策。

44032.Name: Reaver Scout
44032.Info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze ally and play a copy of it from your deck.
44032.Flavor: 最近没怪兽可杀，所以我们从军了。

44033.Name: Winch
44033.Info: Choose one: Play a bronze Mechanical card from your graveyard and make it Doomed; Or boost all machines on your side of the board by 3.
44033.Flavor: 就是一个绞盘。没什么可大惊小怪的。

44034.Name: Bloody Flail
44034.Info: Deal 5 damage and Spawn a Specter.
44034.Flavor: 有些武器在整个北方领域都禁止使用。因为它们所造成的伤害超出了人们的想象。

45001.Name: Specter
45001.Flavor: 身陷无尽的战斗，却早已忘记了起因。

45002.Name: Left Flank Infantry
45002.Flavor: 看在我是老兵的份上！打赏个一克朗吧？

45003.Name: Right Flank Infantry
45003.Flavor: 看在我是老兵的份上！打赏个一克朗吧？

51001.Name: Francesca Findabair
51001.Info: Deploy: Swap a card with one of your choice and boost it by 3.
51001.Flavor: 世上没有轻而易举的和平，人类的压迫终将画下残酷的句点。

51002.Name: Eithné
51002.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver special card.
51002.Flavor: 树精女王眼似融银，心如冷钢。

51003.Name: Filavandrel
51003.Info: Deploy: Create a Silver special card.
51003.Flavor: 虽然我们人数不多、四散分离，但我们的内心燃烧得比任何时候都要炽热。

51004.Name: Brouver Hoog
51004.Info: Deploy: Play a non-Spying Silver unit or a Bronze Dwarf from your deck.
51004.Flavor: 那个老糊涂？你甚至分不清他是活人还是木偶！

52001.Name: Saskia
52001.Info: Deploy: Swap 2 cards with 2 Bronze cards.
52001.Flavor: 王权于我毫无意义，只有东方那位才配为尊。

52002.Name: Saesenthessis
52002.Info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Dwarf ally on the Board and in the Hand and deal 1 damage to an enemy for each Elf ally on the Board and in the Hand.
52002.Flavor: 我继承了父亲的变身能力……好吧，尽管我只有一种变化形态。

52003.Name: Xavier Moran
52003.Info: Deploy: Boost this unit by the starting power of the Dwarf with the strongest starting power you played this round.
52003.Flavor: 怎么了，公主？吃不惯野味吗？嗯？

52004.Name: Aglaïs
52004.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver special card from your opponent's graveyard, then Banish it.
52004.Flavor: 布洛克莱昂在滴血……可就连我也无能为力。

52005.Name: Zoltan Chivay
52005.Info: Deploy: Choose 3 units. Strengthen allies by 2 and move them to this unit's row. Damage enemies by 2 and move them to the opposite row.
52005.Flavor: 一人单独喝酒的滋味，就好比俩人一起蹲坑。

52006.Name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
52006.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Ambush from your Deck.
52006.Flavor: 他们一见我的疤就知道：这下死定了。

52007.Name: Iorveth
52007.Info: Deploy: Deal 8 damage to an enemy. If the unit was destroyed, boost all Elves in your hand by 1.
52007.Flavor: 国王还是乞丐于我并无差别，人类少一个算一个。

52008.Name: Milva
52008.Info: Deploy: Return each player's Highest Bronze or Silver unit to their deck.
52008.Flavor: 每次拉弓射箭，我总想起父亲。他……应该会为我骄傲吧。

52009.Name: Morenn: Forest Child
52009.Info: Ambush: When your opponent plays a Bronze or Silver special card, flip over and cancel its ability.
52009.Flavor: 布洛克莱昂的意义远高于我的生命。她是一位母亲，关怀着自己的孩子们。我至死都要捍卫她。

52011.Name: Ithlinne Aegli
52011.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Spell, Boon or Hazard from your deck twice.
52011.Flavor: 她因不断预言世界末日而闻名遐迩——那些可不是什么好玩言论。

52012.Name: Iorveth: Meditation
52012.Info: Deploy: Force 2 enemies on the same row to Duel each other.
52012.Flavor: 即使伊欧菲斯只剩一只眼睛，他内心的洞察力也无人能及。

52013.Name: Isengrim: Outlaw
52013.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Play a Bronze or Silver special card from your deck; or Create a Silver Elf.
52013.Flavor: 在我们眼前的便是艾尔斯克德格山道，再往前，就是瑟瑞卡尼亚和哈克兰。这将是一条漫长而危险的道路。要想一同走下去，我们就得摒除彼此的猜忌。

53001.Name: Yaevinn
53001.Info: Spying. Single-Use. Deploy: Draw a special card and a unit. Keep one and return the other to your deck.
53001.Flavor: 我们是汇成风暴的雨滴。

53002.Name: Ele'yas
53002.Info: Whenever you draw this unit or return it to your deck, boost self by 2.
53002.Flavor: 只要出于爱，疯狂就是合理的。

53003.Name: Ciaran aep Easnillen
53003.Info: Deploy: Toggle a unit's Lock status and move it to this unit's row on its side.
53003.Flavor: 通往自由的路由鲜血铺就，而非墨水写成。

53004.Name: Sheldon Skaggs
53004.Info: Deploy: Move all allies on this unit's row to random rows and boost self by 1 for each.
53004.Flavor: 我可是在战况最激烈的前线！

53005.Name: Dennis Cranmer
53005.Info: Deploy: Strengthen all your Dwarves by 1, wherever they are.
53005.Flavor: 我知道如何执行命令，冲别人去说教吧。

53006.Name: Morenn
53006.Info: Ambush: When a unit is played from either hand on your opponent's side, flip over and deal 7 damage to that unit.
53006.Flavor: 艾思娜女士的女儿继承了她无与伦比的美貌，也同样极端仇视与人类有关的一切。

53007.Name: Yarpen Zigrin
53007.Info: Resilience. Whenever a Dwarf ally appears, boost self by 1.
53007.Flavor: 听说过巨龙奥克维斯塔吗？石英山那只？亚尔潘·齐格林与他的矮人同伴们把它解决了。

53008.Name: Malena
53008.Info: Ambush: After 2 turns, flip over and Charm the Highest Bronze or Silver enemy with 5 power or less.
53008.Flavor: 我恨你们，人类。你们全都一个样。

53009.Name: Aelirenn
53009.Info: When 5 Elven allies are on the board, Summon this unit.

53010.Name: Braenn
53010.Info: Deploy: Deal damage equal to this unit's power. If a unit was destroyed, boost all your Dryad and Ambush units by 1, wherever they are.
53010.Flavor: 莫娜？不，不。我是布蕾恩。布洛克莱昂的女儿。

53011.Name: Toruviel
53011.Info: Ambush: When your opponent passes, turn this Unit over and Boost 2 Units on each side by 2.
53011.Flavor: 我很乐意站在你面前，直视你的双眼然后干掉你……但你臭死了，人类。

53012.Name: Pavko Gale
53012.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Item from your deck.
53012.Flavor: 为蓝山的精灵走私粮食最多的人当属盖尔。他为他们带来了一袋袋芜菁，还有最最珍贵的韭葱，因此被亲切地称为“舅舅”。

53013.Name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
53013.Info: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Alzur's Thunder.
53013.Flavor: 我是名贤者。我的力量源于占有知识，而非传播知识。

53014.Name: Milaen
53014.Info: Deploy: Deal 6 damage to the units at the end of a row.
53014.Flavor: 老男爵对待偷猎者向来毫不留情。幸亏麦莉运气够好，老男爵已经死了，他的手下也成了亡命之徒。

53015.Name: Éibhear Hattori
53015.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a lower or equal Bronze or Silver Scoia'tael unit.
53015.Flavor: 只有一样东西能和他打造的长剑相媲美——他包的饺子。

53016.Name: Paulie Dahlberg
53016.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a non-Support Bronze Dwarf.
53016.Flavor: 快走！这是个该死的陷阱！

53017.Name: Barclay Els
53017.Info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Dwarf from your deck and Strengthen it by 3.
53017.Flavor: 嫌我们的蜂蜜酒味道不好？好办，堵住你的鼻子就行了！

53018.Name: Morana Runestone
53018.Info: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael card.

53019.Name: Nature's Gift
53019.Info: Play a Bronze or Silver Special card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
53019.Flavor: 你们贪得无厌地榨干大地，野蛮强横地攫取它的财富。但在我们这儿，它生机勃勃，春华秋实，慷慨大方。因为它爱我们，正如我们爱它。

53020.Name: Pit Trap
53020.Info: Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 3 damage to units on contact.
53020.Flavor: 简单、廉价，又十分好用。难怪它是松鼠党最喜欢用的一种陷阱。

53021.Name: Mahakam Horn
53021.Info: Choose One: Create a Bronze or Silver Dwarf; or Strengthen a unit by 7.
53021.Flavor: 从前，玛哈坎举办过一次吹号角比赛。那一天，矮人们学到了重要的一课：不要在积雪殷厚的雪上下大声吹号。

54001.Name: Vrihedd Sappers
54001.Flavor: 不管流言怎么说，精灵才不会碰人类的头皮。因为虱子太多了。

54002.Name: Elven Scout
54002.Flavor: 他们说精灵踏雪无痕。不过要我说，“他们”不过是一帮住在乡下的白痴，就知道胡说八道。

54003.Name: Vrihedd Neophyte
54003.Info: Deploy: Boost 2 random units in your hand by 1.
54003.Flavor: 许多非人种族在城市里饱受歧视和排斥，于是决定加入松鼠党。

54004.Name: Vrihedd Brigade
54004.Info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from its row and move a unit to this row on its side.

54005.Name: Dwarven Mercenary
54005.Info: Deploy: Move a unit to this row on its side. If it's an ally, boost it by 3.
54005.Flavor: 工作就该既有趣又赚钱——比如拿悬赏换金子。

54006.Name: Farseer
54006.Info: If a different Ally or Unit in your Hand is Boosted during your turn, Boost self by 2 at the end of the turn.
54006.Flavor: 有时候，他的话语听似令人费解，但其中总是蕴藏着深邃的道理和惊人的智慧。

54007.Name: Vrihedd Dragoon
54007.Info: On turn end, boost a random loyal unit in your hand by 1.
54007.Flavor: 我见过的最可怕的场景？卡特利欧纳瘟疫、范格堡被夷为平地，还有维里赫德旅骑兵的冲锋。

54008.Name: Dol Blathanna Archer
54008.Info: Deploy: Deal 3 damage, then deal 1 damage.
54008.Flavor: 再走一步试试，人类。你眉宇间插根箭肯定好看得多。

54009.Name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
54009.Info:
Deploy: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Whenever an enemy moves, deal 2 damage to it. Whenever this unit moves, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
54009.Flavor: 也许你能躲过他们，但要被发现了，就别浪费时间逃跑了。

54010.Name: Hawker Smuggler
54010.Info: Whenever an enemy appears, boost self by 1.
54010.Flavor: 谁付的钱多我就给谁卖命，不然就挑个最容易抢的去抢。

54011.Name: Hawker Support
54011.Info: Deploy: Boost a unit in your hand by 3.
54011.Flavor: 矮人和精灵在我眼里都一样，给钱就行。

54012.Name: Mahakam Marauder
54012.Info: Whenever this Unit is Boosted, Damaged, Strengthened or Weakened, Boost it by 3.
54012.Flavor: 在玛哈坎崎岖的悬崖峭壁上狩猎可不是件简单事……但矮人们也从不轻易向危险低头。

54013.Name: Vrihedd Vanguard
54013.Info:
Deploy: Boost Elf allies by 1.
Whenever you Swap this card, trigger its ability.
54013.Flavor: 管他泰莫利亚人还是瑞达尼亚人，杀无赦。

54014.Name: Dol Blathanna Bomber
54014.Info: Deploy: Spawn an Incinerating Trap on an enemy row.
54014.Flavor: 他们的追踪本领犹如猎犬，双腿健似矫鹿，残忍更胜恶魔。

54015.Name: Dwarven Skirmisher
54015.Info: Deploy: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If the unit was not destroyed, boost self by 3.
54015.Flavor: 我跟十字镐打了一辈子交道，动动斧头算什么问题？

54016.Name: Mahakam Defender
54016.Flavor: 听好了，我们是天生的战士——拳拳到肉，绝不留情！

54017.Name: Half-Elf Hunter
54017.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Doomed default copy of this unit.
54017.Flavor: 被人类痛恨，被精灵唾骂，而且学校操场上谁都不肯带他们玩。难怪半精灵一肚子委屈。

54018.Name: Hawker Healer
54018.Info: Deploy: Boost 2 Allies by 3, and then Heal them.
54018.Flavor: 帮你包扎，没问题——只要你有钱。

54019.Name: Pyrotechnician
54019.Info: Deploy: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy on each row.
54019.Flavor: 在玛哈坎，这份行当的风险非同一般，因此回报也异常优厚。其中最负盛名的行业翘楚，当数那位名叫麦柯尔·贝的矮人。

54020.Name: Vrihedd Officer
54020.Info: Deploy: Swap a card and boost self by its base power.
54020.Flavor: “仇恨之火比地狱烈焰更猛烈，比任何伤口都更刻骨铭心。”

54021.Name: Elven Swordmaster
54021.Info: Deploy: Deal damage equal to this unit's power.
54021.Flavor: 战斗如同舞蹈，千万不能让你的对手领舞。

54022.Name: Mahakam Guard
54022.Flavor: 破坏玛哈坎的和平只有一种下场：一记重锤。

54023.Name: Panther
54023.Info: Deploy: Deal 7 damage to an enemy on a row with less than 4 units.
54023.Flavor: 曾经有位牛堡学者在观察一只黑豹后，宣称它不过是颜色不同的花豹而已。黑豹貌似对这一说法毫不关心。他还没等学者完成研究，就把他狼吞虎咽地吃下了肚。

54024.Name: Wardancer
54024.Info: Whenever you Swap this unit, play it automatically on a random row.
54024.Flavor: 你说那个女精灵在大家打得不可开交时跳起舞来了？你疯了吗，下士？！

54025.Name: Blue Mountain Elite
54025.Info:
Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit.
Whenever this unit moves, boost self by 2.
54025.Flavor: 听到他们奔袭的动静时，想跑已来不及了……

54026.Name: Mahakam Volunteers
54026.Info: Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit.
54026.Flavor: 呼啊！呼啊！把你们的屁股准备好！我们要狠狠地踹一脚！踢得你们夹着尾巴到处跑！

54027.Name: Dol Blathanna Sentry
54027.Info: If in hand, deck or on board, boost self by 1 whenever you play a special card.
54027.Flavor: 只要我们一息尚存，就绝不容许人类践踏多尔·布雷坦纳的绿荫。

54028.Name: Sage
54028.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Alchemy or Spell card, then Banish it.
54028.Flavor: 亲爱的，知识，乃是一种特权。而特权，只能被实力相当的人所分享。

54029.Name: Dwarven Agitator
54029.Info: Deploy: Spawn a default copy of a random different Bronze Dwarf from your Deck.
54029.Flavor: “记住我说的话，如果你们不行动起来，人类就会抢走我们的姑娘！”

54030.Name: Elven Mercenary
54030.Info: Deploy: Look at 2 random Bronze special cards from your deck, then play 1.
54030.Flavor: 我瞧不起松鼠党，但不讨厌他们的钱。

54031.Name: Elven Blade
54031.Info: Deal 10 damage to a non-Elf unit.
54031.Flavor: 精灵的利剑轻盈，却能造成重伤。

54032.Name: Crushing Trap
54032.Info: Deal 6 damage to the units at the end of an enemy row.
54032.Flavor: 要是被它击倒，你就别想在爬起来了。

55001.Name: Incinerating Trap
55001.Info: Damage all units on this row by 2 on turn end
55001.Flavor: 小心……！再走一步，你就要被化成青烟了。

62001.Name: Olaf
62001.Info: Deploy: Deal 10 damage to self. Reduce the damage inflicted by 2 for each Beast you played this match.
62001.Flavor: 备受敬仰的小史凯利格岛竞技场十冠王。

62002.Name: Hjalmar an Craite
62002.Info: Deploy: Spawn the Lord of Undvik on the opposite row.
62002.Flavor: 別为死者哭泣，敬他们一杯吧！

62003.Name: Vabjorn
62003.Info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage. If the unit was already damaged , destroy it instead.

62004.Name: Ermion
62004.Info: Deploy: Draw 2 cards, then Discard 2 cards.

62005.Name: Wild Boar of the Sea
62005.Info: On turn end, Strengthen the unit to the left by 1, then deal 1 damage to the unit to the right. 5 Armor.
62005.Flavor: 只消对尼弗迦德人提起这个名字，他们就会吓得尿裤子……

62006.Name: Birna Bran
62006.Info: Deploy: Apply Skellige Storm to an enemy row.
62006.Flavor: 史凯利格需要一位强大的国王，无论付出何等代价。

62007.Name: Cerys an Craite
62007.Info: When 4 units are Resurrected while this unit is in the graveyard, Resurrect it and gain 1 strength
62007.Flavor: 大家叫我小雀鹰，知道为什么吗？因为我专治你这种鼠辈。

62008.Name: Madman Lugos
62008.Info: Deploy: Discard a Bronze Unit from your Deck and Damage a Unit by the Discarded Unit's base Power.

62009.Name: Ulfhedinn
62009.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the enemies were damaged, deal 2 damage instead.
62009.Flavor: 狼人？哦，不，不……比那要糟糕得多。

62010.Name: Cerys: Fearless
62010.Info: Resurrect the next unit your Discard.
62010.Flavor: 我必须要团结各大家族。我希望能够避免开战。但假如尼弗迦德执意来犯，那我们就一定要同仇敌忾。

62011.Name: Coral
62011.Info: Deploy: Transform a Bronze or Silver unit into a Jade Figurine.
62011.Flavor: 她的真名是艾丝翠特·丽塔尼德·艾斯杰芬比约斯道提尔，这名字不管怎么念都拗口极了。

62012.Name: Hym
62012.Info: Deploy, Choose One: Play a Bronze or Silver Cursed unit from your deck; or Create a Silver unit from your opponent's deck.
62012.Flavor: 诸神对我说话……我听见他们在暗影中的私语……

62013.Name: Kambi
62013.Flavor: 终焉之刻来临时，金公鸡坎比便会叫醒沉睡的汉姆多尔。

63002.Name: Udalryk
63002.Info: Spying. Single-Use. Deploy: Look at 2 cards from your deck. Draw one and Discard the other.
63002.Flavor: 诸神已经发话，必须献上祭品。

63003.Name: Djenge Frett
63003.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to 2 allies and Strengthen self by 2 for each.
63003.Flavor: 如果通缉令上写着“无论死活”，绝大多数赏金猎人会直接快刀斩乱麻。但我不会。如果被我抓到，我会把人吊起来挠痒，让他笑到岔气。

63004.Name: Blueboy Lugos
63004.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Spectral Whale on an enemy row.

63005.Name: Morkvarg
63005.Info: Whenever this unit enter the graveyard, Resurrect it and Weaken it by half.
63005.Flavor: 史凯利格有史以来最大的恶人。

63006.Name: Svanrige Tuirseach
63006.Info: Deploy: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
63006.Flavor: 皇帝最开始也认为自己登上皇位是出于偶然。

63007.Name: Donar an Hindar
63007.Info: Deploy: Toggle a unit's Lock status, then move a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to yours.
63007.Flavor: 我已齐集众位族长，有话快说。

63008.Name: Giant Boar
63008.Info: Deploy: Destroy a random ally, then boost self by 10.
63008.Flavor: 如果在林子里捡到一头硕大的野猪，大多数人会尿了裤子，手忙脚乱地朝最近的树上爬。史凯利格人不会。他们反回两眼发直，大流口水。

63009.Name: Champion of Hov
63009.Flavor: 他只对打败他的人报上名讳，因为他是个巨魔游侠，懂吗？

63010.Name: Draig Bon-Dhu
63010.Info: Deploy: Strengthen 2 units in your graveyard by 3.
63010.Flavor: 竖起耳朵，来听上一听奎特家族的英雄事迹吧！

63011.Name: Holger Blackhand
63011.Info: Deploy: Deal 7 damage. If the unit was destroyed, Strengthen the Highest unit in your graveyard by 3.
63011.Flavor: 敬尼弗迦德皇帝，祝他不得善终！

63012.Name: Harald Houndsnout
63012.Info: Deploy: Spawn Wilfred to the left, Wilhelm to the right and Wilmar on the opposite row.
63012.Flavor: 曾经是托达洛克家族的首领，如今只是一个喋喋不休的疯子。

63013.Name: Yoana
63013.Info: Deploy: Heal an ally, then boost it by the amount Healed.
63013.Flavor: 没人会把我当成一名老练的盔甲师傅。只是一个人类，而且还是个女人。可是矮人铁匠就不同了……

63014.Name: Derran
63014.Info: Whenever an enemy is damaged, boost this unit by 1.
63014.Flavor: 能引发这样的疯狂，相比是极其可怖的……

63015.Name: Skjall
63015.Info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Cursed Unit from your Deck.
63015.Flavor: 把他剔出族谱！不许任何人给他食物和庇护！

63016.Name: Gremist
63016.Info: Deploy: Spawn Rain, Clear Skies or Roar.
63016.Flavor: 精通炼金术的大德鲁伊，也是群岛脾气最差的老混蛋。

63017.Name: Sigrdrifa
63017.Info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Skellige unit.
63017.Flavor: 跪在我身边，向圣母低头。

63018.Name: Stribog Runestone
63018.Info: Create a Bronze or Silver Skellige card.
63018.Flavor: 欧菲尔的符文大师可以把它们组合成威力无比的符文。

63019.Name: Restore
63019.Info: Return a Bronze or Silver Skellige Unit from your Graveyard to your Hand and set its base Power to 8, then play a card from your Hand.
63019.Flavor: 那些该死的女术士又抢咱们的风头！只要几个年轻姑娘挥挥手就能解决的话，谁还选择这么费时费力的办法？

63020.Name: Ornamental Sword
63020.Info: Create a Bronze or Silver Skellige Soldier and Strengthen it by 3.
63020.Flavor: 看上去很精美，但顶多也就只能用来抹抹黄油。

64001.Name: An Craite Warrior
64001.Flavor: 我们的吟游诗人会世代传颂我的功绩，而你死了就会被世人遗忘！

64002.Name: Dimun Pirate
64002.Info: Deploy: Discard all copies of this unit from your deck.
64002.Flavor: 我能看到他们眼中的恐惧。他们害怕我……害怕迪门家族！

64003.Name: Heymaey Flaminica
64003.Info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from the row and move 2 allies to it.
64003.Flavor: 佛兰明妮卡是女德鲁伊最高领袖的头衔，她备受众人的崇敬，拥有无比的力量。

64004.Name: Dimun Smuggler
64004.Info: Deploy: Return a Bronze unit from your graveyard to your deck.
64004.Flavor: 史派克鲁格是一片死水，不过没有关系。我们想要什么，就从你们那儿夺。

64005.Name: Berserker Marauder
64005.Info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each damaged or Cursed ally.
64005.Flavor: 把汤乖乖喝完，不然狂战士就会过来，把你给掳走。

64006.Name: Heymaey Skald
64006.Info: Deploy: Boost all allies from a Clan of your choice by 2.
64006.Flavor: 海玫家族的事迹将流芳千古。

64007.Name: An Craite Blacksmith
64007.Info: Deploy: Strengthen an ally by 2 and give it 2 Armor.
64007.Flavor: 记住我的话：一面好盾能救你的小命。

64008.Name: Savage Bear
64008.Info: Whenever a unit is played from either hand on your opponent's side, deal 1 damage to it.
64008.Flavor: “驯服”？哈，小子，史凯利格人也许能训练它们，但那跟驯服完全不同……

64009.Name: An Craite Greatsword
64009.Info: Every 2 turns, if damaged, on turn start, Heal self and Strengthen by 2.
64009.Flavor: 啊哈哈，你真让我笑掉大牙，北方佬！怎么？我手上这把大家伙，你都不一定拿得动，还想用它对付我？

64010.Name: Tuirseach Archer
64010.Flavor: 你能射中两百步外的移动靶吗？我能，而且是在暴风雨中。

64011.Name: Drummond Warmonger
64011.Info: Deploy: Discard a Bronze card from your deck.
64011.Flavor: 为大局着想？！战争就是大局，至善至恶，没什么比它更带劲的了！

64012.Name: Tuirseach Skirmisher
64012.Info: Whenever this unit is Resurrected, Strengthen it by 4.
64012.Flavor: 记好了：我们对朋友掏心窝，对敌人挥斧子。

64013.Name: Svalblod Ravager
64013.Info: Whenever this unit is damaged or Weakened, transform into a Raging Bear.
64013.Flavor: 在诗人的歌谣里，鏖战中变身的狂战士跟野熊没两样。

64014.Name: An Craite Whaler
64014.Info: Deploy: Move an enemy to the opposite row, then deal damage equal to the number of units on that row.
64014.Flavor: 无论是海上还是港口，他们盯上的目标永远是最漂亮的那个。

64015.Name: An Craite Armorsmith
64015.Info: Deploy: Heal 2 allies and and give them 3 Armor.

64016.Name: Tuirseach Veteran
64016.Info: Deploy: Strengthen all your other Clan Tuirseach units in hand, deck, and on board by 1.
64016.Flavor: 我见人所未见，能人所不能。

64017.Name: Dimun Light Longship
64017.Info: On turn end, deal 1 damage to the unit to the right, then boost self by 2.
64017.Flavor: 你以为能在史凯利格海域逃出他们的手掌心？自求多福吧。

64018.Name: An Craite Longship
64018.Info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat this ability whenever you Discard a card.
64018.Flavor: 据说只要有长船出海劫掠，汉姆多尔就会心潮澎湃。

64019.Name: Dimun Warship
64019.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to the same unit 4 times.
64019.Flavor: 迪门家族的战船轻盈迅捷，最适合追逐缓慢笨重的商船。

64020.Name: An Craite Marauder
64020.Info: Deploy: Deal 4 damage. If Resurrected, deal 6 damage instead.
64020.Flavor: 你疯了不成？你想去史凯利格？哪些野蛮人会让你吃大苦头的！

64021.Name: Tuirseach Hunter
64021.Flavor: 别怀疑我们的狩猎本领，只恨史派克鲁格的猎物太少……

64022.Name: Tuirseach Axeman
64022.Info: Whenever an enemy on the opposite row is damaged, boost self by 1. 2 Armor.
64022.Flavor: 小姑娘才用剑，弄把斧头吧。

64023.Name: An Craite Warcrier
64023.Info: Deploy: Boost an ally by half its power.
64023.Flavor: 有人为泰莫利亚抛头颅，有人为尼弗迦德洒热血。我只为骑士的誓言而战。

64024.Name: An Craite Raider
64024.Info: Whenever you Discard this unit, Resurrect it.
64024.Flavor: 我们可是奎特家族！別人用金子购买，我们拿血汗交换。

64025.Name: Drummond Queensguard
64025.Info: Deploy: Resurrect all your copies of this unit.
64025.Flavor: 史凯利格的女王向来由最勇猛、最凶悍的持盾女卫保护。

64026.Name: Drummond Shieldmaid
64026.Info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage to an enemy unit. If the target was already injured, play one copy from the deck.
64026.Flavor: 我们的敌人会像打上嶙峋海岸的波浪一样，倒在我们的盾前。

64027.Name: Heymaey Herbalist
64027.Info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Organic or Hazard card from your deck.
64027.Flavor: “在史凯利格，我们可不会把聪明的女人绑在柴火上，而是听取她们的建议。”

64028.Name: Dimun Corsair
64028.Flavor: 大海属于我们。海里的东西，不管是漂着的、游着的、划着的，也都是咱们的！

64029.Name: Heymaey Spearmaiden
64029.Info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to a Machine or Soldier ally, then play a copy of it from your deck.
64029.Flavor: “史凯利格的女人生性狂野，难以捉摸。所有的部队都要把她们视为严重的威胁，绝不能低估她们的实力。”—将军对帝国舰队入侵部队下的指令

64030.Name: Heymaey Protector
64030.Info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Item from your deck.
64030.Flavor: 他天不怕地不怕，除了弗蕾雅的怒火……还有他老婆。

64031.Name: Dimun Pirate Captain
64031.Info: Deploy: Play a different Bronze Dimun unit from your deck.

64032.Name: Priestess of Freya
64032.Flavor: 圣母弗蕾雅是爱、美与丰饶的女神。

64033.Name: Tuirseach Bearmaster
64033.Flavor: 别碰他。别盯着他的眼睛瞧。事实上……压根就别靠近他。

64034.Name: Bone Talisman
64034.Info: Choose One: Resurrect a Bronze Beast or Cultist unit or Heal an ally and Strengthen it by 3.
64034.Flavor: 有时最普通不过的物件却拥有最为强大的威力。

65001.Name: Hemdall
65001.Info: Deploy: Destroy all units and clear all Boons and Hazards.
65001.Flavor: 白霜到来之时，汉姆多尔将吹响战斗的号角。

65003.Name: Lord of Undvik
65003.Info: Spying. Deathwish: Boost enemy Hjalmars by 10.
65003.Flavor: 这个怪物将名门世族托达洛克家族的故乡——乌德维克岛变成了荒凉之地，昔日荣光一去不返……

65004.Name: Spectral Whale
65004.Info: Spying. On turn end, move to a random row and deal 1 damage to all units on it. Deathwish: invoke this ability again.
65004.Flavor: “呃，座头鲸应该没那么大。那是头长须鲸。”“嘴那么短的长须鲸？你被药草冲昏了头吗！”

65005.Name: Wilfred
65005.Info: Deathwish: Strengthen a random Ally by 3.
65005.Flavor: 高个子的是威尔玛。他右边的是威尔弗雷德。结巴的那个是威尔海姆。

65006.Name: Wilhelm
65006.Info: Deathwish: Damage all Unis on the opposite row by 1.
65006.Flavor: 高个子的是威尔玛。他右边的是威尔弗雷德。结巴的那个是威尔海姆。

65007.Name: Wilmar
65007.Info: Deathwish: The opposing player plays a random Bronze Cursed Unit from their Deck.
65007.Flavor: 高个子的是威尔玛。他右边的是威尔弗雷德。结巴的那个是威尔海姆。

61001.Name: Harald the Cripple
61001.Info: Deploy: Split 10 damage randomly between enemies on the opposite row.
61001.Flavor: 没人知道他的绰号从何而来，更没人敢问。

61002.Name: Crach an Craite
61002.Info: Deploy: Strengthen the Highest non-Spying Bronze or Silver unit in your deck by 2 and play it.
61002.Flavor: 尼弗迦德人叫我“蒂斯·伊斯·穆瑞”，也就是海上野猪。他们还用我的名号来吓唬小孩！

61003.Name: Eist Tuirseach
61003.Info: Deploy: Spawn a Bronze Clan Tuirseach Soldier.
61003.Flavor: 埃斯特来到辛特拉，本想帮助克拉茨·奎特参加帕薇塔公主的选亲宴，结果自己却赢走了王后的芳心。

61004.Name: Bran Tuirseach
61004.Info: Deploy: Discard up to 3 cards from your deck and Strengthen them by 1.
61004.Flavor: 没人能取代布兰王，但后世定会努力尝试。

70001.Name: Quen
70001.Info: Choose a bronze/silver unit in your hand, boost it and all its copies in your hand and deck by 2 and give them shield. The shield can block any damage once.

70002.Name: Detlaff: Higher Vampire
70002.Info: Deploy, Choose one: Play a bronze unit from your deck with power equal to or less than this unit's. Send it to the graveyard at the end of the turn; or Consume a bronze unit from your deck with more power than this unit and gain its power.

70003.Name: Hammond
70003.Info:
Deploy, Choose one: Create a Skellige bronze machine unit; or Boost all friendly machines on the board by 2.
Units in this row are immune to damage from hazards.

70004.Name: Glynnis Aep Loernach
70004.Info: On round end, if at the top or bottom of the deck, summon it to a random row.

70005.Name: Vysogota Of Corvo
70005.Info:
On round start, boost a unit to the left by 3, damage self by 1 and move to a row with the least number of units.
Deathwish: Boost the weakest friendly unit by 6.

70006.Name: Lady Of The Lake
70006.Info: Deploy: Weaken self by the value equal to twice the number of the remaining cards in your hand and deck

70007.Name: Prophet Lebioda
70007.Info: When banished, boost all friendly units by 1.

70008.Name: Vivienne: Oriole
70008.Info: On turn end, if your total power exceeds the opponent's power by 25 points or more, return to your hand.

70009.Name: Fleder
70009.Info:
Deploy: Summon a card with the same name from your deck to the same row.
Whenever a bronze/silver enemy unit becomes damaged, boost self by 1.

70010.Name: Protofleder
70010.Info:
Deploy: Shuffle a "Fleder" to the top of your deck.
Whenever a bronze/silver enemy unit becomes injured, boost self by 2.

70011.Name: Lady Of The Lake: Advent
70011.Info: Spawn "Lady Of The Lake". (Deploy: Weaken self by the value equal to twice the number of the remaining cards in your hand and deck)

70012.Name: Toussaint Knight Errant
70012.Info: Deploy: For each card advantage your opponent has, boost self by 4 points.

70013.Name: Corrupted Flaminca
70013.Info: Deploy: Discard a "Torrential Rain" from your deck, then spawn "Torrential Rain" on this unit's row and on the opposing row.

70014.Name: The Goddess of Justice
70014.Info: Bid for the Red Coin. Choose how many points you are willing to give up to start the game second. At the end of the first round, this card is summoned to Blue Coin player's board from the graveyard.

70015.Name: Brokilon Sentinel
70015.Info: On round end, if the opponent has exactly 4 units in the opposing row, deal 1 damage to all enemy units in that row.

70016.Name: Sukrus
70016.Info: Deploy: Choose 1 bronze card in the hand and discard all cards with the same name from the deck.

70017.Name: Cintrian Field Medic
70017.Info: Deploy: Shuffle a non-identical friendly bronze unit back to the deck, and then play a random bronze unit card from the deck.

70019.Name: Zoltan: Warrior
70019.Info: Deploy: Summon Figgis Merluzzo and Munro Bruys, boost them by the value of Zotan's boost.

70020.Name: Figgis Merluzzo
70020.Info: Deploy: Summon Zoltan Warrior and Munro Bruys, boost them by the value of Figgis' boost.

70021.Name: Munro Bruys
